#' `ExponentialPrior` Class
2 
#'
3 
#' A class for defining exponential priors to be translated to Stan code.
4 
#' Objects of class `ExponentialPrior` should not be created directly but by
5 
#' the constructor [exponential_prior()].
6 
#'
7 
#' @slot stan_code character. Stan implementation of the prior, with
8 
#' placeholders for exponential Stan function parameters surrounded with
9 
#' `{{` and `}}` to be replaced with [glue::glue()].
10 
#' @slot n_param integer. Number of prior parameters (1).
11 
#' @slot constraint character. Support of prior distribution,
12 
#' `"<lower=0>"`.
13 
#' @slot beta numeric. Inverse scale (>0).
14 
#' @include prior_class.R
15 
#' @family prior classes
16 
.exponential_prior <- setClass(
17 
  "ExponentialPrior",
18 
  contains = "Prior",
19 
  slots = c(beta = "numeric"),
20 
  prototype = list(
21 
    n_param = 1L,
22 
    stan_code = "exponential({{object@beta}})",
23 
    constraint = "<lower=0>"
24 
  ),
25 
  validity = function(object) {
26 
    if (object@beta <= 0) {
27 
      return("beta must be >0")
28 
    }
29 
    return(TRUE)
30 
  }
31 
)
32 

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' Prior exponential distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @param beta numeric. Inverse scale (>0).

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' Stan reference <https://mc-stan.org/docs/functions-reference/exponential-distribution.html>

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Object of class [`ExponentialPrior`][ExponentialPrior-class].

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @family priors

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' ep <- exponential_prior(1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
exponential_prior <- function(beta) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    38x
                    
                      
  .exponential_prior(beta = beta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "ExponentialPrior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    1x
                    
                      
    cat("Exponential Distribution\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    1x
                    
                      
    cat("Parameters:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    1x
                    
                      
    print.data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    1x
                    
                      
      data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    1x
                    
                      
        Stan = c("beta"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    1x
                    
                      
        R = c("rate"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    1x
                    
                      
        Value = c(object@beta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
      ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    1x
                    
                      
      row.names = FALSE, right = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (object@constraint != "") print(h_glue("Constraints: {{object@constraint}}"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    66

# plot ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' plot(exponential_prior(0.1))

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
  f = "plot",

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
  signature = c("ExponentialPrior", "missing"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(x, y, add = FALSE, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    1x
                    
                      
    limits <- stats::qexp(c(0.005, 0.995), rate = x@beta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    1x
                    
                      
    density_fun <- function(values) stats::dexp(values, rate = x@beta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    1x
                    
                      
    dist_type <- "continuous"

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    1x
                    
                      
    callNextMethod(default_limits = limits, density_fun = density_fun, dist_type = dist_type, add = add, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    81

#' Compile MCMC sampler using STAN and create analysis object

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data_matrix matrix. The data matrix, including all covariates to be

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' adjusted for, all relevant outcome variables, and treatment arm and external

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' control arm flags.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param covariates `Covariates`. Object of class [`Covariates`][Covariates-class] as output by

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' the function [`add_covariates()`].

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param outcome `Outcome`. Object of class [`Outcome`][Outcome-class] as output by

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' [`exp_surv_dist()`], [`weib_ph_surv_dist()`], or [`logistic_bin_outcome()`].

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param borrowing `Borrowing`. Object of class [`Borrowing`][Borrowing-class] as output by

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' [`borrowing_details()`].

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param treatment `Treatment`. Object of class [`Treatment`][Treatment-class] as output by

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' [`treatment_details()`].

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param quiet logical. Whether to suppress messages (`TRUE`) or not (`FALSE`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' the default)

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Object of class [`Analysis`][Analysis-class].

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @include analysis_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @importFrom stats complete.cases

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' anls <- create_analysis_obj(

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_matrix = example_matrix,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   covariates = add_covariates(

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'     covariates = c("cov1", "cov2"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'     priors = normal_prior(0, 1000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'   outcome = exp_surv_dist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'     "time",

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'     "cnsr",

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'     baseline_prior = normal_prior(0, 1000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'   borrowing = borrowing_details(

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'     "BDB",

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'     "ext",

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'     exponential_prior(.001)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'   treatment = treatment_details(

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'     "trt",

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'     normal_prior(0, 1000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
create_analysis_obj <- function(data_matrix,

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
                                covariates = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
                                outcome,

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
                                borrowing,

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
                                treatment,

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
                                quiet = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    15x
                    
                      
  assert_matrix(data_matrix, mode = "numeric")

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    15x
                    
                      
  assert_multi_class(covariates, c("Covariates", "NULL"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    15x
                    
                      
  assert_class(outcome, "Outcome")

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    15x
                    
                      
  assert_class(borrowing, "Borrowing")

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    15x
                    
                      
  assert_class(treatment, "Treatment")

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    15x
                    
                      
  assert_flag(quiet)

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
  ## For now, require all fields (even if not used by model) to be non-missing

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    15x
                    
                      
  if (any(!complete.cases(data_matrix))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    !
                    
                      
    stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    !
                    
                      
      "Data matrix must not include any missing data. ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    !
                    
                      
      "Filter to only complete cases or remove irrelevant columns"

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    15x
                    
                      
  analysis_obj <- .analysis_obj(

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    15x
                    
                      
    data_matrix = data_matrix,

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    15x
                    
                      
    covariates = covariates,

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    15x
                    
                      
    outcome = outcome,

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    15x
                    
                      
    borrowing = borrowing,

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    15x
                    
                      
    treatment = treatment

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
  # check data matrix has columns

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    15x
                    
                      
  check_data_matrix_has_columns(analysis_obj)

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    15x
                    
                      
  if (!quiet) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    7x
                    
                      
    message("Inputs look good.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    7x
                    
                      
    if (analysis_obj@borrowing@method == "Full borrowing") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    5x
                    
                      
      message(

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    5x
                    
                      
        h_glue("NOTE: dropping column `{{analysis_obj@borrowing@ext_flag_col}}` for full borrowing.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    7x
                    
                      
    if (analysis_obj@borrowing@method == "No borrowing") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    !
                    
                      
      message(

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
        h_glue("NOTE: excluding `{{analysis_obj@borrowing@ext_flag_col}}` == `1`/`TRUE` for no borrowing.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
  # Model string components

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    15x
                    
                      
  functions_str <- make_model_string_functions(analysis_obj)

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    15x
                    
                      
  data_str <- make_model_string_data(analysis_obj)

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    15x
                    
                      
  param_str <- make_model_string_parameters(analysis_obj)

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    15x
                    
                      
  trans_param_str <- make_model_string_transf_param(analysis_obj)

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    15x
                    
                      
  model_str <- make_model_string_model(analysis_obj)

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
  # Model string

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    15x
                    
                      
  stan_model_string <- h_glue("

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    15x
                    
                      
    {{functions_str}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    15x
                    
                      
    {{data_str}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    15x
                    
                      
    {{param_str}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    15x
                    
                      
    {{trans_param_str}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    15x
                    
                      
    {{model_str}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
  ")

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    15x
                    
                      
  analysis_obj@model_string <- stan_model_string

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
  # Compile model

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    15x
                    
                      
  stan_file <- write_stan_file(analysis_obj@model_string)

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    15x
                    
                      
  if (!quiet) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    7x
                    
                      
    analysis_obj@model <- cmdstan_model(stan_file)

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    8x
                    
                      
  } else if (quiet) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    8x
                    
                      
    suppressMessages(

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    8x
                    
                      
      analysis_obj@model <- cmdstan_model(stan_file)

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    15x
                    
                      
  if (!quiet) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    7x
                    
                      
    message("Stan program compiled successfully!")

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
  # Prepare data inputs

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    15x
                    
                      
  analysis_obj@ready_to_sample <- TRUE

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    15x
                    
                      
  if (!quiet) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    7x
                    
                      
    message("Ready to go! Now call `mcmc_sample()`.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    15x
                    
                      
  return(analysis_obj)

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
}

#' `GammaPrior` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for defining gamma priors to be translated to Stan code.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Objects of class `GammaPrior` should not be created directly but by

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' the constructor [gamma_prior()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot stan_code character. Stan implementation of the prior, with

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' placeholders for gamma stan function parameters surrounded with

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' `{{` and `}}` to be replaced with [glue::glue()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot n_param integer. Number of prior parameters (2).

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot constraint character. Support of prior distribution,

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' `"<lower=0>"`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot alpha numeric. Shape (>0).

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot beta numeric. Inverse scale (>=0).

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @include prior_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @family prior classes

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
.gamma_prior <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
  "GammaPrior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
  contains = "Prior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
    alpha = "numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
    beta = "numeric"

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  prototype = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
    n_param = 2L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
    stan_code = "gamma({{object@alpha}}, {{object@beta}})",

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
    constraint = "<lower=0>"

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
  validity = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
    if (object@alpha <= 0 || object@beta <= 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
      return("Both alpha and beta must be >= 0")

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
    return(TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' Prior gamma distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' @param alpha numeric. Shape (>0).

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @param beta numeric. Inverse scale (>=0).

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' Stan reference <https://mc-stan.org/docs/functions-reference/gamma-distribution.html>

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Object of class [`GammaPrior`][GammaPrior-class].

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @family priors

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' gp <- gamma_prior(0.001, 0.001)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
gamma_prior <- function(alpha, beta) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    10x
                    
                      
  .gamma_prior(alpha = alpha, beta = beta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "GammaPrior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    1x
                    
                      
    cat("Gamma Distribution\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    1x
                    
                      
    cat("Parameters:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    1x
                    
                      
    print.data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    1x
                    
                      
      data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    1x
                    
                      
        Stan = c("alpha", "beta"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    1x
                    
                      
        R = c("shape", "rate"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    1x
                    
                      
        Value = c(object@alpha, object@beta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
      ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    1x
                    
                      
      row.names = FALSE, right = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (object@constraint != "") print(h_glue("Constraints: {{object@constraint}}"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
# plot ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#' plot(gamma_prior(0.1, 0.1))

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
  f = "plot",

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  signature = c("GammaPrior", "missing"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(x, y, add = FALSE, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    1x
                    
                      
    limits <- c(0, stats::qgamma(0.99, shape = x@alpha, rate = x@beta))

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    1x
                    
                      
    density_fun <- function(values) stats::dgamma(values, shape = x@alpha, rate = x@beta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    1x
                    
                      
    dist_type <- "continuous"

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    1x
                    
                      
    callNextMethod(default_limits = limits, density_fun = density_fun, dist_type = dist_type, add = add, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
.onAttach <- function(libname, pkgname) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    2x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(cmdstanr::cmdstan_version(error_on_NA = FALSE))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    !
                    
                      
    possible_paths <- unique(c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    !
                    
                      
      cmdstan_default_install_path(),

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    !
                    
                      
      Sys.getenv("CMDSTAN"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    !
                    
                      
      Sys.getenv("CMDSTAN_PATH"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    !
                    
                      
      "/root/.cmdstan",

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    !
                    
                      
      "~/.cmdstan"

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
    ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    !
                    
                      
    possible_paths <- possible_paths[dir.exists(possible_paths)]

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    !
                    
                      
    if (length(possible_paths)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    !
                    
                      
      for (try_path in possible_paths) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    !
                    
                      
        new_path <- tryCatch(

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    !
                    
                      
          suppressMessages(cmdstanr::set_cmdstan_path(try_path)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    !
                    
                      
          warning = function(w) NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    !
                    
                      
          error = function(e) NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    !
                    
                      
        if (!is.null(new_path)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    !
                    
                      
          packageStartupMessage("CmdStan path set to: ", new_path)

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    !
                    
                      
          return(invisible(NULL))

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Plot Probability Density Function Values

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x values

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' @param y probability density values `y = f(x)`

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... passed to [plot()]

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' Plots the density values as a curve with the lower vertical limit set to 0.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' x <- seq(-2, 2, len = 100)

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' y <- dnorm(x)

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' plot_pdf(x, y)

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
plot_pdf <- function(x, y, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    8x
                    
                      
  pars_list <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    8x
                    
                      
    x = x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    8x
                    
                      
    y = y,

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    8x
                    
                      
    type = "l",

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    8x
                    
                      
    ylim = c(0, max(y[is.finite(y)])),

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    8x
                    
                      
    ylab = "density",

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    8x
                    
                      
    xlab = ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    !
                    
                      
  for (i in ...names()) pars_list[[i]] <- list(...)[[i]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    8x
                    
                      
  do.call(plot, pars_list)

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' Plot Probability Mass Function Values

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x values

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @param y probability mass values `y = f(x)`

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... passed to [plot()] and [rect()]

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' @param col Fill color of bars.

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @param add Add bars to existing plot.

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' Plots the probability values as a barplot.

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' x <- seq(0, 5)

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' y <- dpois(x, lambda = 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' plot_pmf(x, y)

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
plot_pmf <- function(x, y, ..., col = "grey", add = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    2x
                    
                      
  if (isFALSE(add)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    2x
                    
                      
    pars_list <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    2x
                    
                      
      xlim = range(x) + c(-0.5, 0.5),

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    2x
                    
                      
      ylim = c(0, max(y)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    2x
                    
                      
      type = "n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    2x
                    
                      
      xaxt = "n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    2x
                    
                      
      xlab = "",

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    2x
                    
                      
      ylab = "",

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    2x
                    
                      
      x = x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    2x
                    
                      
      y = y

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    !
                    
                      
    for (i in ...names()) pars_list[[i]] <- list(...)[[i]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    2x
                    
                      
    do.call(plot, pars_list)

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    2x
                    
                      
    graphics::axis(side = 1, at = x, col.ticks = NA)

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    2x
                    
                      
  graphics::rect(x - 0.5, 0, x + 0.5, y, col = rep(col, length(y)), ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#' Glue Strings with Default Arguments

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' Calls [glue::glue()] with `.open = '{{'` and `.close = '}}'`

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#' to simplify gluing Stan code.

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... Arguments passed to [glue::glue()]

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' @param collapse logical. Collapse result of glue() with [`glue_collapse()`][glue::glue_collapse()]?

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#' @param collapse_sep string. A character string to separate the original strings in the collapsed string.

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A character (of class `glue`).

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' @noRd

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#' name <- "Tom"

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#' psborrow2:::h_glue("hello, my name is {{name}}.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#' name <- c("Tom", "Fred")

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#' psborrow2:::h_glue("hello, my name is {{name}}.", collapse = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
h_glue <- function(..., collapse = FALSE, collapse_sep = "\n") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    573x
                    
                      
  result <- glue::glue(..., .open = "{{", .close = "}}", .envir = parent.frame())

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    573x
                    
                      
  if (isTRUE(collapse)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    5x
                    
                      
    result <- glue::glue_collapse(result, sep = collapse_sep)

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    573x
                    
                      
  result

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#' Get constraints from a list of `Prior`s

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#' @param cov_obj A `Covariates` object.

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#' @return A `matrix` with columns "lower" and "upper" with rows for each `Prior`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#' psborrow2:::get_covariate_constraints(

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#'   add_covariates(

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#'     c("cov1", "cov2", "cov3"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#'     list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#'       normal_prior(0, 10),

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#'       beta_prior(0.3, 0.3),

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
#'       gamma_prior(30, 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#'     )

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
get_covariate_constraints <- function(cov_obj) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    8x
                    
                      
  n_covs <- length(cov_obj@covariates)

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    8x
                    
                      
  if (is(cov_obj@priors, "Prior")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    6x
                    
                      
    cons <- rep(parse_constraint(cov_obj@priors), each = n_covs)

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    6x
                    
                      
    cons <- matrix(cons, ncol = 2, dimnames = list(NULL, c("lower", "upper")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    2x
                    
                      
    cons <- t(vapply(cov_obj@priors, function(p) parse_constraint(p), numeric(2L)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    8x
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(cons, any.missing = FALSE, len = 2 * n_covs)

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    8x
                    
                      
  cons

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#' Extract Upper and Lower Bounds from a Prior object

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object `Prior` Object of class Prior

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#' @return

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#' A list with upper and lower bounds. Any unspecified bounds are set to `-Inf` or `Inf`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
#' np <- normal_prior(0, 100)

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
#' psborrow2:::parse_constraint(np)

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
parse_constraint <- function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    52x
                    
                      
  assert_class(object, "Prior")

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    52x
                    
                      
  s <- eval_constraints(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    52x
                    
                      
  s <- gsub("[<>[:space:]]", "", s)

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    52x
                    
                      
  s_list <- strsplit(s, ",")[[1]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    52x
                    
                      
  lower <- as.numeric(

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    52x
                    
                      
    gsub("lower[[:space:]]*=[[:space:]]*", "", s_list[grepl("lower", s_list)])
