  covs <- object@BaselineObject@covariates

                    		
                  

                  

                    314
                    !
                    
                      
  names <- unlist(lapply(covs, function(x) x@names))

                    		
                  

                  

                    315
                    !
                    
                      
  assert_subset(var, choices = names)

                    		
                  

                  

                    316
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    317
                    !
                    
                      
  index <- which(names == var)

                    		
                  

                  

                    318
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    319
                    !
                    
                      
  mean_int <- unlist(lapply(covs, function(x) x@means_int))[index]

                    		
                  

                  

                    320
                    !
                    
                      
  mean_ext <- unlist(lapply(covs, function(x) x@means_ext))[index]

                    		
                  

                  

                    321
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    322
                    !
                    
                      
  sd_int <- unlist(lapply(covs, function(x) sqrt(diag(x@covariance_int))))[index]

                    		
                  

                  

                    323
                    !
                    
                      
  sd_ext <- unlist(lapply(covs, function(x) sqrt(diag(x@covariance_ext))))[index]

                    		
                  

                  

                    324
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    325
                    !
                    
                      
  ifelse(

                    		
                  

                  

                    326
                    !
                    
                      
    object[["ext"]] == 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    327
                    !
                    
                      
    pnorm(object[[var]], mean_int, sd_int),

                    		
                  

                  

                    328
                    !
                    
                      
    pnorm(object[[var]], mean_ext, sd_ext)

                    		
                  

                  

                    329
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    330
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    331
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    332
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    333
                    
                    
                      
#' Binary Cut-Off Transformation

                    		
                  

                  

                    334
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    335
                    
                    
                      
#' @param name variable to transform

                    		
                  

                  

                    336
                    
                    
                      
#' @param int_cutoff cut-off for internal patients, numeric between 0 and 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    337
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ext_cutoff cut-off for external patients, numeric between 0 and 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    338
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    339
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Transformation function to be used in [create_baseline_object()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    340
                    
                    
                      
#'  Sets quantile values larger than cut-off value to `TRUE` otherwise `FALSE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    341
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    342
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    343
                    
                    
                      
#' # Creates a simple function, where `data` is a `BaselineDataFrame`:

                    		
                  

                  

                    344
                    
                    
                      
#' function(data) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    345
                    
                    
                      
#'   ext <- data$ext == 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    346
                    
                    
                      
#'   q <- get_quantiles(data, name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    347
                    
                    
                      
#'   ifelse(ext, q > int_cutoff, q > ext_cutoff)

                    		
                  

                  

                    348
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    349
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    350
                    
                    
                      
binary_cutoff <- function(name, int_cutoff, ext_cutoff) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    351
                    !
                    
                      
  assert_character(name, len = 1, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    352
                    !
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(int_cutoff, lower = 0, upper = 1, any.missing = FALSE, len = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    353
                    !
                    
                      
  assert_numeric(ext_cutoff, lower = 0, upper = 1, any.missing = FALSE, len = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    354
                    !
                    
                      
  function(data) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    355
                    !
                    
                      
    ext <- data$ext == 0

                    		
                  

                  

                    356
                    !
                    
                      
    q <- get_quantiles(data, name)

                    		
                  

                  

                    357
                    !
                    
                      
    as.integer(ifelse(ext, q > int_cutoff, q > ext_cutoff))

                    		
                  

                  

                    358
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    359
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Compile MCMC sampler using STAN and create simulation object

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data_matrix_list `SimDataList`. The list of lists of data matrices created

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' with `sim_data_list()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param covariate `SimCovariateList` or `Covariate` or `NULL`. List of `Covariate` objects created

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' with `sim_covariate()`, a single `Covariate` object created by `add_covariates()`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' or `NULL` (no covariate adjustment).

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param outcome `SimOutcomeList` or `Outcome`. List of `Outcome` objects created with

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' `sim_outcome()`, or single `Outcome` object (e.g., created by `exp_surv_dist()`).

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param borrowing `SimBorrowingList` or `Borrowing`. List of `Borrowing` objects created

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' with `sim_borrowing()`, or a single `Borrowing` object created by `borrowing_details()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param treatment `SimTreatmentList` or `Treatment`. List of `Treatment` objects created

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' with `sim_treatment()` or a single `Treatment` object created by `treatment_details()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @param quiet logical. Whether to print messages (`quiet = FALSE`) or not

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' (`quiet = TRUE`, the default)

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Object of class [`Simulation`][Simulation-class].

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @include simulation_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' base_mat <- matrix(

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(0, 200), rep(0, 200), rep(1, 200),

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(1, 200), rep(0, 200), rep(0, 200),

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(0, 600)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   ncol = 3,

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   dimnames = list(NULL, c("ext", "trt", "driftOR"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' add_binary_endpoint <- function(odds_ratio,

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'                                 base_matrix = base_mat) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'   linear_predictor <- base_matrix[, "trt"] * log(odds_ratio)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'   prob <- 1 / (1 + exp(-linear_predictor))

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'   bin_endpoint <- rbinom(

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'     NROW(base_matrix),

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'     1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'     prob

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'   cbind(base_matrix, matrix(bin_endpoint, ncol = 1, dimnames = list(NULL, "ep")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' data_list <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'   list(add_binary_endpoint(1.5), add_binary_endpoint(1.5)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'   list(add_binary_endpoint(2.5), add_binary_endpoint(2.5))

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' guide <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'   trueOR = c(1.5, 2.5),

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'   driftOR = c(1.0, 1.0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'   index = 1:2

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' sdl <- sim_data_list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_list = data_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#'   guide = guide,

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#'   effect = "trueOR",

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#'   drift = "driftOR",

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#'   index = "index"

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' sim_object <- create_simulation_obj(

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_matrix_list = sdl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#'   outcome = logistic_bin_outcome("ep", normal_prior(0, 1000)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#'   borrowing = sim_borrowing_list(list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#'     full_borrowing = borrowing_details("Full borrowing", "ext"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#'     bdb = borrowing_details("BDB", "ext", exponential_prior(0.0001))

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#'   )),

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#'   treatment = treatment_details("trt", normal_prior(0, 1000))

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
create_simulation_obj <- function(data_matrix_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
                                  covariate = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
                                  outcome,

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
                                  borrowing,

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
                                  treatment,

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
                                  quiet = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  # Check inputs

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_class(data_matrix_list, "SimDataList")

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_multi_class(covariate, c("SimCovariateList", "Covariates", "NULL"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_multi_class(outcome, c("SimOutcomeList", "Outcome"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_multi_class(borrowing, c("SimBorrowingList", "Borrowing"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    1x
                    
                      
  assert_multi_class(treatment, c("SimTreatmentList", "Treatment"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
  # Create empty covariate list if NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (is.null(covariate)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    1x
                    
                      
    covariate <- sim_covariate_list(covariate_list = list(`No adjustment` = NULL))

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
  # Create lists for non-list objects

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (is(covariate, "Covariates")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    !
                    
                      
    covariate <- sim_covariate_list(covariate_list = list(default = covariate))

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (is(outcome, "Outcome")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    !
                    
                      
    outcome <- sim_outcome_list(outcome_list = list(default = outcome))

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (is(borrowing, "Borrowing")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    !
                    
                      
    borrowing <- sim_borrowing_list(borrowing_list = list(default = borrowing))

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (is(treatment, "Treatment")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    !
                    
                      
    treatment <- sim_treatment_list(treatment_list = list(default = treatment))

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
  # Create object

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    1x
                    
                      
  simulation_obj <- .simulation_obj(

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    1x
                    
                      
    data_matrix_list = data_matrix_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    1x
                    
                      
    covariate = covariate,

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    1x
                    
                      
    outcome = outcome,

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    1x
                    
                      
    borrowing = borrowing,

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    1x
                    
                      
    treatment = treatment

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
  # Check that inputs are consistent with each other

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
  ## Data matrices all have external flags, treatment flags, and covariates

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    1x
                    
                      
  search_cols <- get_vars(simulation_obj)

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    1x
                    
                      
  for (i in seq_along(simulation_obj@data_matrix_list@data_list)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    2x
                    
                      
    for (j in seq_along(simulation_obj@data_matrix_list@data_list[[i]])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    4x
                    
                      
      if (!all(search_cols %in% colnames(simulation_obj@data_matrix_list@data_list[[i]][[j]]))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    !
                    
                      
        which_not_in <- search_cols[

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    !
                    
                      
          which(!search_cols %in%

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    !
                    
                      
            colnames(simulation_obj@data_matrix_list@data_list[[i]][[j]]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
        ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    !
                    
                      
        stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    !
                    
                      
          "The following columns were specified in the simulation but ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    !
                    
                      
          "are missing in some simulated data matrices: '",

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    !
                    
                      
          paste0(which_not_in, collapse = "', '"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
          "'"

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
  ## Data matrices do not contain missing data

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    1x
                    
                      
  for (i in seq_along(simulation_obj@data_matrix_list@data_list)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    2x
                    
                      
    for (j in seq_along(simulation_obj@data_matrix_list@data_list[[i]])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    4x
                    
                      
      mat_subset <- simulation_obj@data_matrix_list@data_list[[i]][[j]][, search_cols]

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    4x
                    
                      
      if (!all(complete.cases(mat_subset))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    !
                    
                      
        stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    !
                    
                      
          "Missing data detected in >1 matrix in `data_matrix_list`. ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    !
                    
                      
          "Could be one of the following columns: '",

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    !
                    
                      
          paste0(search_cols, collapse = "', '"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
          "'. ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    !
                    
                      
          "Error found in simulation_obj@data_matrix_list@data_list[[", i, "]][[", j, "]]"

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
  # Create guide

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    1x
                    
                      
  simulation_obj@guide <- Reduce(

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    1x
                    
                      
    merge,

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    1x
                    
                      
    init = simulation_obj@data_matrix_list@guide,

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    1x
                    
                      
    x = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    1x
                    
                      
      simulation_obj@outcome@guide,

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    1x
                    
                      
      simulation_obj@borrowing@guide,

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    1x
                    
                      
      simulation_obj@covariate@guide,

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    1x
                    
                      
      simulation_obj@treatment@guide

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    1x
                    
                      
  simulation_obj@n_combos <- NROW(simulation_obj@guide)

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    1x
                    
                      
  simulation_obj@n_analyses <- sum(simulation_obj@guide$n_datasets_per_param)

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
  # Create analysis objects

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    1x
                    
                      
  simulation_obj@analysis_obj_list <- make_analysis_object_list(simulation_obj,

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    1x
                    
                      
    quiet = quiet

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
  # Return simulation object

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    1x
                    
                      
  return(simulation_obj)

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Make model string of Stan's model block

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Create the Stan string encompassed by model `{}`

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param analysis_obj `Analysis`. Object of class [`Analysis`][Analysis-class] created by

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' `psborrow2:::.analysis_obj()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @return `glue` `character` containing the Stan code for the data block.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' anls_obj <- psborrow2:::.analysis_obj(

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_matrix = example_matrix,

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   outcome = exp_surv_dist("time", "cnsr", normal_prior(0, 100)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   borrowing = borrowing_details(

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Full borrowing",

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'     "ext"

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   treatment = treatment_details("trt", normal_prior(0, 100))

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' psborrow2:::make_model_string_model(anls_obj)

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
make_model_string_model <- function(analysis_obj) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  ### Treatment prior

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    19x
                    
                      
  beta_trt_prior <- get_prior_string(analysis_obj@treatment@trt_prior)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
  ### Linear predictor

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    19x
                    
                      
  has_covariates <- !is.null(analysis_obj@covariates)

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    19x
                    
                      
  is_bdb <- analysis_obj@borrowing@method == "BDB"

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    19x
                    
                      
  if (has_covariates && is_bdb) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    2x
                    
                      
    linear_predictor <- h_glue("

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    2x
                    
                      
      lp = X * beta + Z * alpha + trt * beta_trt;

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    2x
                    
                      
      elp = exp(lp) ;")

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    17x
                    
                      
  } else if (!has_covariates && is_bdb) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    7x
                    
                      
    linear_predictor <- h_glue("

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    7x
                    
                      
      lp = Z * alpha + trt * beta_trt;

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    7x
                    
                      
      elp = exp(lp) ;")

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    10x
                    
                      
  } else if (has_covariates && !is_bdb) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    2x
                    
                      
    linear_predictor <- h_glue("

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    2x
                    
                      
      lp = alpha + X * beta + trt * beta_trt ;

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    2x
                    
                      
      elp = exp(lp) ;")

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    8x
                    
                      
  } else if (!has_covariates && !is_bdb) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    8x
                    
                      
    linear_predictor <- h_glue("

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    8x
                    
                      
      lp = alpha + trt * beta_trt ;

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    8x
                    
                      
      elp = exp(lp);")

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    !
                    
                      
    stop("No linear predictor defined.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
  ### Add priors for relevant parameters

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    19x
                    
                      
  if (NROW(analysis_obj@outcome@param_priors) > 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    1x
                    
                      
    names <- names(analysis_obj@outcome@param_priors)

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    1x
                    
                      
    values <- get_prior_string(analysis_obj@outcome@param_priors)

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    1x
                    
                      
    outcome_prior <- h_glue("{{names}} ~ {{values}} ;", collapse = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    18x
                    
                      
    outcome_prior <- ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
  ### Add priors on betas

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    19x
                    
                      
  if (has_covariates) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    4x
                    
                      
    i <- seq_along(analysis_obj@covariates@covariates)

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    4x
                    
                      
    value <- get_prior_string(analysis_obj@covariates@priors)

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    4x
                    
                      
    index <- if (test_named(value)) get_vars(analysis_obj@covariates) else rep(1, length(i))

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    4x
                    
                      
    covariate_prior <- h_glue("beta[{{i}}] ~ {{value[index]}} ;", collapse = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    15x
                    
                      
    covariate_prior <- ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
  ### Add in tau and alphas if method = BDB

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    19x
                    
                      
  if (analysis_obj@borrowing@method == "BDB") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    9x
                    
                      
    tau_prior <- get_prior_string(analysis_obj@borrowing@tau_prior)

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    9x
                    
                      
    alpha_2_prior <- get_prior_string(analysis_obj@outcome@baseline_prior)

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    9x
                    
                      
    borrowing_string <- h_glue("

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    9x
                    
                      
      tau ~ {{tau_prior}} ;

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    9x
                    
                      
      real sigma;

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    9x
                    
                      
      sigma = 1 / tau;

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    9x
                    
                      
      alpha[2] ~ {{alpha_2_prior}} ;

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    9x
                    
                      
      alpha[1] ~ normal(alpha[2], sqrt(sigma)) ;")

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    10x
                    
                      
  } else if (analysis_obj@borrowing@method != "BDB") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    10x
                    
                      
    alpha_prior <- get_prior_string(analysis_obj@outcome@baseline_prior)

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    10x
                    
                      
    borrowing_string <- h_glue("alpha ~ {{alpha_prior}} ;")

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    !
                    
                      
    borrowing_string <- ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
  ### Add in likelihood function

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    19x
                    
                      
  likelihood_string <- h_glue("{{analysis_obj@outcome@likelihood_stan_code}}")

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    19x
                    
                      
  h_glue("

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    19x
                    
                      
  model {

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    19x
                    
                      
    vector[N] lp;

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    19x
                    
                      
    vector[N] elp;

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    19x
                    
                      
    beta_trt ~ {{beta_trt_prior}};

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    19x
                    
                      
    {{linear_predictor}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    19x
                    
                      
    {{outcome_prior}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    19x
                    
                      
    {{covariate_prior}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    19x
                    
                      
    {{borrowing_string}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    19x
                    
                      
    {{likelihood_string}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
  }")

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' `SimSampleSize` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for creating matrices for simulation studies

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' containing flags specifying whether the patient is from the concurrent

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' trial or not (`ext` = 0 for concurrent trial, `ext` = 1 for historical

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' data) and whether the patient is on the experimental therapy or not

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' (`trt` = 0 for no experimental therapy, `trt` = 1 for experimental therapy).

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot n_internal_control integer. Number of patients to be simulated in the

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' internal control arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot n_external_control integer. Number of patients to be simulated in the

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' external control arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot n_internal_experimental integer. Number of patients to be simulated

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' in the internal experimental arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot mat matrix. Matrix with two columns, `ext` (flag for being from

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' external data source) and `trt` (flag for receiving experimental

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' treatment)

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
.sim_samplesize <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
  "SimSampleSize",

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
    n_internal_control = "numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
    n_external_control = "numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
    n_internal_experimental = "numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
    mat = "matrix"

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
  validity = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
    if (object@n_internal_control <= 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
      return("n_internal_control must be >0")

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
    if (object@n_external_control <= 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
      return("n_external_control must be >0")

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
    if (object@n_internal_experimental <= 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
      return("n_external_experimental must be >0")

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' Set simulation study parameters for sample size

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' @param n_internal_control integer. Number of patients to be simulated in the

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' internal control arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' @param n_external_control integer. Number of patients to be simulated in the

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' external control arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @param n_internal_experimental integer. Number of patients to be simulated

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' in the internal experimental arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Object of class `SimSampleSize`

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' @family simulation

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' ss <- sim_samplesize(200, 200, 500)

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
sim_samplesize <- function(n_internal_control,

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
                           n_external_control,

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
                           n_internal_experimental) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    6x
                    
                      
  assert_int(n_internal_control)

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    4x
                    
                      
  assert_int(n_external_control)

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    4x
                    
                      
  assert_int(n_internal_experimental)

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    4x
                    
                      
  sim_samplesize_obj <- .sim_samplesize(

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    4x
                    
                      
    n_internal_control = n_internal_control,

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    4x
                    
                      
    n_external_control = n_external_control,

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    4x
                    
                      
    n_internal_experimental = n_internal_experimental

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    1x
                    
                      
  ext <- rep(c(0L, 1L, 0L), times = c(n_internal_control, n_external_control, n_internal_experimental))

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    1x
                    
                      
  trt <- rep(c(0L, 0L, 1L), times = c(n_internal_control, n_external_control, n_internal_experimental))

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    1x
                    
                      
  sim_samplesize_obj@mat <- cbind(ext, trt)

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    1x
                    
                      
  return(sim_samplesize_obj)

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "SimSampleSize",

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("SimSampleSize Object\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(glue::glue("{object@n_internal_control} internal control patients"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(glue::glue("{object@n_external_control} external control patients"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(glue::glue("{object@n_internal_experimental} external treated patients"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' `SimTreatmentList` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for treatment details as part of a simulation study.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Objects of class `SimTreatmentList` should not be created

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' directly but by the constructor `sim_treatment_list()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot treatment_list named list of object of class `Treatment`, one object

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' for each parameter variation.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @include treatment_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @include treatment_details.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
.sim_treatment_list <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
  "SimTreatmentList",

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
    treatment_list = "list",

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
    guide = "data.frame"

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
  validity = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
