    if (!all(vapply(object@treatment_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
      function(item) is(item, "Treatment"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
      FUN.VALUE = logical(1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
    ))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
      return("`treatment_list` must be a list of `Treatment` objects.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
    if (is.null(names(object@treatment_list))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
      return("`treatment_list` must be named.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
    if (any(names(object@treatment_list) == "")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
      return("All items in `treatment_list` must be named.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
    if (length(unique(names(object@treatment_list))) != length(names(object@treatment_list))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
      return("All names supplied to `treatment_list` must be unique.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' Input treatment details for a simulation study

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' A function for defining which treatment scenarios should be evaluated as

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' part of a simulation study.

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @param treatment_list named list of objects of class `Treatment` created

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' by `treatment_details()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @family simulation classes

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' treatment_scenarios <- sim_treatment_list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'   list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Standard" = treatment_details("trt", normal_prior(0, 1000))

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
sim_treatment_list <- function(treatment_list) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    10x
                    
                      
  treatments <- .sim_treatment_list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    10x
                    
                      
    treatment_list = treatment_list

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    5x
                    
                      
  treatments@guide <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    5x
                    
                      
    treatment_scenario = names(treatments@treatment_list)

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    5x
                    
                      
  treatments

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "SimTreatmentList",

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("SimTreatmentList object with ", NROW(object@treatment_list), " different scenario(s)\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    !
                    
                      
    if (NROW(object@treatment_list) <= 10) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    !
                    
                      
      print(object@guide)

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
# get_vars ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname get_vars

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#' @include generics.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
  f = "get_vars",

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "SimTreatmentList",

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    2x
                    
                      
    unique(vapply(object@treatment_list, get_vars, character(1)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Trim model matrix to just include relevant columns

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Take an `Analysis` object's `data_matrix` and remove

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' everything unnecessary in preparation of making input data for Stan

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param analysis_obj `Analysis`. An object of class `Analysis`

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' as created through `.create_analysis_obj()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Trimmed data matrix

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' anls <- create_analysis_obj(

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_matrix = example_matrix,

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   covariates = add_covariates(

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'     covariates = c("cov1", "cov2"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'     priors = normal_prior(0, 1000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'   outcome = exp_surv_dist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'     "time",

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'     "cnsr",

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'     baseline_prior = normal_prior(0, 1000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   borrowing = borrowing_details(

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'     "BDB",

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'     "ext",

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'     exponential_prior(.001)

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'   treatment = treatment_details(

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'     "trt",

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'     normal_prior(0, 1000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' trimmed_mat <- psborrow2:::trim_data_matrix(anls)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
trim_data_matrix <- function(analysis_obj) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    12x
                    
                      
  required_rows <- if (analysis_obj@borrowing@method == "No borrowing") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    1x
                    
                      
    !as.logical(analysis_obj@data_matrix[, get_vars(analysis_obj@borrowing)])

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    11x
                    
                      
    seq_len(NROW(analysis_obj@data_matrix))

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    12x
                    
                      
  required_cols <- if (analysis_obj@borrowing@method != "BDB") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    6x
                    
                      
    setdiff(get_vars(analysis_obj), get_vars(analysis_obj@borrowing))

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    6x
                    
                      
    get_vars(analysis_obj)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    12x
                    
                      
  return(analysis_obj@data_matrix[required_rows, required_cols])

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' `HalfNormalPrior` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for defining half normal priors to be translated to Stan code.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Objects of class `HalfNormalPrior` should not be created directly but by

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' the constructor [half_normal_prior()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot stan_code character. Stan implementation of the prior, with

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' placeholders for the half normal stan function parameters surrounded with

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' `{{` and `}}` to be replaced with [glue::glue()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot n_param integer. Number of prior parameters (2).

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot constraint character. Support of prior distribution. In a half normal

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' prior, constraint is `mu`

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot mu numeric. Location.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot sigma numeric. Scale (>0).

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @include prior_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @family prior classes

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
.half_normal_prior <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
  "HalfNormalPrior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
  contains = "Prior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
    mu = "numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
    sigma = "numeric"

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  prototype = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
    n_param = 2L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
    stan_code = "normal({{object@mu}}, {{object@sigma}})",

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
    constraint = "<lower={{object@mu}}>"

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
  validity = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
    if (object@sigma <= 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
      return("sigma must be >0")

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
    return(TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' Prior half-normal distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' @param mu numeric. Location.

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @param sigma numeric. Scale (>0).

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' Stan reference <https://mc-stan.org/docs/functions-reference/normal-distribution.html>

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Object of class [`HalfNormalPrior`][HalfNormalPrior-class].

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @family priors

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' hcp <- half_normal_prior(1, 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
half_normal_prior <- function(mu, sigma) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    8x
                    
                      
  .half_normal_prior(mu = mu, sigma = sigma)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "HalfNormalPrior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    1x
                    
                      
    cat("Half normal Distribution\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    1x
                    
                      
    cat("Parameters:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    1x
                    
                      
    print.data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    1x
                    
                      
      data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    1x
                    
                      
        Stan = c("mu", "sigma"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    1x
                    
                      
        R = c("location", "scale"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    1x
                    
                      
        Value = c(object@mu, object@sigma)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
      ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    1x
                    
                      
      row.names = FALSE, right = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    1x
                    
                      
    print(h_glue("Constraints: {{eval_constraints(object)}}"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
# plot ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' plot(half_normal_prior(0, 1), xlim = c(-20, 20))

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#' plot(half_normal_prior(0, 2), xlim = c(-20, 20), col = 2, add = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
  f = "plot",

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  signature = c("HalfNormalPrior", "missing"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(x, y, add = FALSE, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    1x
                    
                      
    limits <- stats::qnorm(c(0.5, 0.995), mean = x@mu, sd = x@sigma)

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    1x
                    
                      
    density_fun <- function(values) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    1x
                    
                      
      ifelse(

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    1x
                    
                      
        values < x@mu,

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    1x
                    
                      
        0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    1x
                    
                      
        stats::dnorm(values, mean = x@mu, sd = x@sigma)

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    1x
                    
                      
    dist_type <- "continuous"

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    1x
                    
                      
    callNextMethod(default_limits = limits, density_fun = density_fun, dist_type = dist_type, add = add, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' `SimDataList` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for defining generated data for use as part of a

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' simulation study. Objects of class `SimDataList` should not be created

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' directly but by the constructor `sim_data_list()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot data_list list of lists of matrices. The lists at the highest

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' level differ in that the parameters used to generate the data. The matrices

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' at lowest level are different iterations of the same data generation

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' parameters.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot guide data.frame. `guide` contains information on the parameters

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' that differ at the highest level of `data_list`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot effect character. The column in `guide` that

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' corresponds to the true treatment effect estimate (hazard ratio or odds ratio).

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot drift character. The column in `guide` that

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' corresponds to the drift between external and internal control arms. A

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' drift >1 means the external arm experiences greater effects.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot index character. The column in `guide` that corresponds

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' to the index of the parameter situations in `data_list`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
.sim_data_list <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
  "SimDataList",

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
    data_list = "list",

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
    guide = "data.frame",

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
    effect = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
    drift = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
    index = "character"

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
  validity = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
    # Format is list of lists

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
    if (!all(vapply(object@data_list, function(item) is(item, "list"), FUN.VALUE = logical(1)))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
      return("`data_list` must be a list of lists")

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
    # At lowest level there are matrices

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
    if (!all(vapply(object@data_list, function(item) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
      all(vapply(item, function(mat) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
        is(mat, "matrix")

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
      }, FUN.VALUE = logical(1)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
    }, FUN.VALUE = logical(1)))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
      return("`data_list` lowest items must be matrices")

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
    # Guide and data are same length

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
    if (NROW(object@guide) != NROW(object@data_list)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
      return("`guide` and `data_list` must be same length")

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
    # Effect, drift, and index are columns in guide

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
    if (!object@effect %in% colnames(object@guide)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
      return("`effect` must be a column in `guide`")

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
    if (!object@drift %in% colnames(object@guide)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
      return("`drift` must be a column in `guide`")

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
    if (!object@index %in% colnames(object@guide)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
      return("`index` must be a column in `guide`")

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
    # n_datasets_per_list is protected

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
    if ("n_datasets_per_param" %in% colnames(object@guide)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
      return("'n_datasets_per_param' is a protected column name in `guide`.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
    # index items must be unique

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
    if (length(unique(object@guide[[object@index]])) != NROW(object@data_list)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
      return("`index` column in guide must be unique, one for each entry in data_list")

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
    # index must be coercable to integer

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
    if (!test_integerish(object@guide[[object@index]])) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
      return("`index` column in guide must of type integer")

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#' Input generated data for a simulation study

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#' A function for defining generated data for use as part of a

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#' simulation study.

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data_list list of lists of matrices. The lists at the highest

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#' level differ in that the parameters used to generate the data. The matrices

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#' at lowest level are different iterations of the same data generation

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#' parameters. See `details`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#' @param guide data.frame. `guide` contains information on the parameters

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#' that differ at the highest level of `data_list`. See `details.`

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#' @param effect character. The column in `guide` that

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#' corresponds to the true treatment effect estimate (hazard ratio or odds ratio).

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#' @param drift character. The column in `guide` that

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#' corresponds to the true drift effect estimate (hazard ratio or odds ratio).

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#' A drift >1 means the external arm experiences greater effects.

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#' @param index character. The column in `guide` that corresponds

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#' to the index column.

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#' In this function, you are providing generated data for analysis in a

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#' simulation study in `psborrow2`. Note that this function does not

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#' do any data generation on your behalf; it assumes that you have generated

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
#' the data already. For a full working example, refer to the relevant vignette:

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#' `vignette('simulation_study', package = 'psborrow2')`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#' More information on the inputs is provided below.

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#' ## Matrix requirements in `data_list`

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#' Each matrix embedded in `data_list` must have:

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#' 1) a flag for whether the patient is an external control

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#' 2) a flag for whether the patient is in the experimental treatment arm

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#' 3) outcome information (time and censorship for survival, flag for

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#' outcome in binary endpoints)

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#' Optionally, the matrices may also contain covariates. See `examples`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#' ## `data_list`

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#' Each set of distinct data generation parameters should be represented by

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#' a single list of matrices. Because multiple scenarios may want to be

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#' compared, a list of list of matrices is preferred. See `examples`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#' ## `guide`

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
#' The `guide` should be a data.frame with one row per scenario. As a

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
#' consquence of this, the length of the list should equal the number of rows

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
#' in the guide. See `examples`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
#' @family simulation classes

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
#' base_mat <- matrix(

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
#'   c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(0, 200), rep(0, 200), rep(1, 200),

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(1, 200), rep(0, 200), rep(0, 200),

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(0, 600)

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
#'   ncol = 3,

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#'   dimnames = list(NULL, c("ext", "trt", "driftOR"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#' add_binary_endpoint <- function(odds_ratio,

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#'                                 base_matrix = base_mat) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#'   linear_predictor <- base_matrix[, "trt"] * log(odds_ratio)

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#'   prob <- 1 / (1 + exp(-linear_predictor))

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
#'   bin_endpoint <- rbinom(

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
#'     NROW(base_matrix),

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#'     1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#'     prob

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#'   cbind(base_matrix, matrix(bin_endpoint, ncol = 1, dimnames = list(NULL, "ep")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#' data_list <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#'   list(add_binary_endpoint(1.5), add_binary_endpoint(1.5)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#'   list(add_binary_endpoint(2.5), add_binary_endpoint(2.5))

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
#' guide <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
#'   trueOR = c(1.5, 2.5),

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
#'   driftOR = c(1.0, 1.0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
#'   ind = c(1, 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
#' sdl <- sim_data_list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_list = data_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
#'   guide = guide,

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
#'   effect = "trueOR",

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
#'   drift = "driftOR",

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
#'   index = "ind"

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
sim_data_list <- function(data_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
                          guide,

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
                          effect,

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
                          drift,

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
                          index) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    12x
                    
                      
  sim_data_list <- .sim_data_list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    12x
                    
                      
    data_list = data_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    12x
                    
                      
    guide = guide,

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    12x
                    
                      
    effect = effect,

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    12x
                    
                      
    drift = drift,

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    12x
                    
                      
    index = index

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    3x
                    
                      
  sim_data_list@guide$n_datasets_per_param <- vapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    3x
                    
                      
    sim_data_list@data_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    3x
                    
                      
    NROW,

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    3x
                    
                      
    FUN.VALUE = integer(1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    3x
                    
                      
  return(sim_data_list)

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "SimDataList",

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("SimDataList object with ", NROW(object@data_list), " different scenarios\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    !
                    
                      
    if (NROW(object@data_list) <= 10) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    !
                    
                      
      print(object@guide)

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
# class union ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
setClassUnion("CovariatesOrNULL", c("Covariates", "NULL"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
# R6 CmdStanModel placeholder

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
setClass("CmdStanModel")

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
setClassUnion("CmdStanModelOrNULL", c("CmdStanModel", "NULL"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' `Analysis` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for defining Analysis details. Objects of class

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' `Analysis` should not be created directly but by the constructor

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' `create_analysis_obj()`.
