                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot data_matrix matrix. The data matrix, including all covariates to be

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' adjusted for, all relevant outcome variables, and treatment arm and external

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' control arm flags.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot covariates `Covariate`. Object of class `Covariate` as output by

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' the function `covariate_details()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot outcome `Outcome`. Object of class `Outcome` as output by

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' `exp_surv_dist()`, `weib_ph_surv_dist()`, or `logistic_bin_outcome()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot borrowing `Borrowing`. Object of class `Borrowing` as output by

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' `borrowing_details()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot treatment `Treatment`. Object of class `Treatment` as output by

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' `treatment_details()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot model_string character. The string that contains the full

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' Stan model code to be compiled.

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot model `CmdStanModel`. The compiled Stan model as output by `cmdstanr::cmdstan_model()`

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot ready_to_sample logical. Is the object ready to sample?

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @include covariate_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#' @include outcome_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @include borrowing_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @include treatment_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @import cmdstanr

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
.analysis_obj <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
  "Analysis",

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
    data_matrix = "matrix",

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
    covariates = "CovariatesOrNULL",

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
    outcome = "Outcome",

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
    borrowing = "Borrowing",

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
    treatment = "Treatment",

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
    model_string = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
    model = "CmdStanModelOrNULL",

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
    ready_to_sample = "logical"

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
  prototype = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
    ready_to_sample = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "Analysis",

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    3x
                    
                      
    cat("Analysis Object\n\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    3x
                    
                      
    cat("Outcome model:", class(object@outcome)[1], "\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    3x
                    
                      
    outcome_vars <- get_vars(object@outcome)

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    3x
                    
                      
    cat("Outcome", ifelse(length(outcome_vars) > 1, "variables:", "variable:"), outcome_vars, "\n\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    3x
                    
                      
    cat("Borrowing method:", object@borrowing@method, "\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    3x
                    
                      
    cat("External flag:", get_vars(object@borrowing), "\n\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    3x
                    
                      
    cat("Treatment variable:", get_vars(object@treatment), "\n\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    3x
                    
                      
    cov_names <- get_vars(object@covariates)

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (!is.null(cov_names)) cat("Covariates:", cov_names, "\n\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    3x
                    
                      
    cat("Data: Matrix with", nrow(object@data_matrix), "observations \n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    3x
                    
                      
    cat(

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    3x
                    
                      
      "    - ", sum(object@data_matrix[, get_vars(object@treatment)] == 0 &

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    3x
                    
                      
        object@data_matrix[, get_vars(object@borrowing)["ext_flag_col"]] == 0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    3x
                    
                      
      " internal controls\n"

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    3x
                    
                      
    cat(

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    3x
                    
                      
      "    - ", sum(object@data_matrix[, get_vars(object@treatment)] == 0 &

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    3x
                    
                      
        object@data_matrix[, get_vars(object@borrowing)["ext_flag_col"]] == 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    3x
                    
                      
      " external controls", ifelse(object@borrowing@method == "No borrowing",

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    3x
                    
                      
        " (ignored in this analysis)\n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    3x
                    
                      
        "\n"

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    3x
                    
                      
    cat(

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    3x
                    
                      
      "    - ", sum(object@data_matrix[, get_vars(object@treatment)] == 1 &

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    3x
                    
                      
        object@data_matrix[, get_vars(object@borrowing)["ext_flag_col"]] == 0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    3x
                    
                      
      " internal experimental\n\n"

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    3x
                    
                      
    if (object@ready_to_sample == TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    !
                    
                      
      cat(

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    !
                    
                      
        "Stan model compiled and ready to sample.\n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    !
                    
                      
        "Call mcmc_sample() next."

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    3x
                    
                      
      cat("Not ready to sample yet.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
# get_vars ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname get_vars

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#' @include generics.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
  f = "get_vars",

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "Analysis",

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    14x
                    
                      
    c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    14x
                    
                      
      get_vars(object@outcome),

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    14x
                    
                      
      get_vars(object@borrowing),

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    14x
                    
                      
      get_vars(object@treatment),

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    14x
                    
                      
      get_vars(object@covariates)

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname get_vars

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#' @include generics.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#' @usage \S4method{get_vars}{NULL}(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
  f = "get_vars",

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "NULL",

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    22x
                    
                      
    NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' `SimCovariates` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for specifying covariate distributions and covariance for

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' simulation studies.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot covariates list. List of covariate mean values or probabilities as

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' generated through `bin_var()` (class `SimVarBin` or `cont_var()`

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' (class `SimVarCont`).

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot covariance_internal matrix. Covariance matrix before binarization

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' for internal patients.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot covariance_external matrix. Covariance matrix before binarization

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' for external patients.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
.sim_covariates <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
  "SimCovariates",

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
    covariates = "list",

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
    covariance_internal = "matrix",

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
    covariance_external = "matrix"

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
  validity = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
    # Covariates are named

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
    if (is.null(names(object@covariates)) |

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
      any(names(object@covariates) == "")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
      return("All covariates must be named")

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
    if (!all(sapply(object@covariates, is, "SimVar"))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
      return("`covariates` must all be of class `SimVar` (use `bin_var()` or `cont_var()`)")

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
    if (length(unique(names(object@covariates))) != length(names(object@covariates))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
      return("named arguments to list for argument `covariates` must all be different")

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
    # Covariance matrices are square, symmetric, correct length

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
    if (!all(dim(object@covariance_internal) == rep(length(object@covariates), 2)) ||

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
      !all(dim(object@covariance_external) == rep(length(object@covariates), 2)) ||

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
      !isSymmetric(object@covariance_internal) ||

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
      !isSymmetric(object@covariance_external)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
      return(paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
        "Covariance matrices must be symmetric square matrices width ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
        "height and width equal to the number of covariates (",

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
        length(object@covariates), ")."

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
      ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
    # Matrices are semi definite

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
    if (!matrixcalc::is.positive.semi.definite(object@covariance_internal) ||

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
      !matrixcalc::is.positive.semi.definite(object@covariance_external)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
      return(paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
        "Covariance matrices must be semi positive definite. ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
        "Try using a different matrix or finding the nearest ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
        "positive definite matrix (e.g., with `Matrix::nearPD()`"

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
      ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' Specify covariates for simulation study

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#' Provide details on the desired covariate distributions and covariance for

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#' for a simulation study.

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#' @param covariates list. Named list of covariate mean values or probabilities as

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' generated through `bin_var()` (class `SimVarBin` or `cont_var()`

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' (class `SimVarCont`). See `details` for more information.

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#' @param covariance_internal matrix. Covariance matrix before binarization

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#' for internal patients.

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' @param covariance_external matrix. Covariance matrix before binarization

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#' for external patients. Defaults to the internal covariance.

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Object of class `SimCovariates`

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' This function is intended to specify the number of covariates and

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' relationships between them for the purposes of designing a simulation

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' study in `psborrow2`. Because the outcome model does not necessarily

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#' need to adjust for covariates, this function is not necessary in

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#' `create_simulation_obj()`. The relationship between the treatment

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#' and the outcome is specified elsewhere (i.e, in `sim_survival()` or

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#' `sim_binary_event()`).

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#' We need a few things to

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#' @family simulation

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#' set.seed(123)

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#' covmat <- matrix(rWishart(1, 2, diag(2)), ncol = 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#' covset1 <- sim_covariates(

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#'   covariates = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#'     cov1 = bin_var(0.5, 0.5),

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#'     cov2 = cont_var(100, 130)

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#'   covariance_internal = covmat

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
sim_covariates <- function(covariates,

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
                           covariance_internal,

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
                           covariance_external = covariance_internal) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
  # Check input classes

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    8x
                    
                      
  assert_list(covariates)

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    8x
                    
                      
  assert_matrix(covariance_internal)

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    8x
                    
                      
  assert_matrix(covariance_external)

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
  # Construct object

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    8x
                    
                      
  sim_covariates_obj <- .sim_covariates(

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    8x
                    
                      
    covariates = covariates,

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    8x
                    
                      
    covariance_internal = covariance_internal,

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    8x
                    
                      
    covariance_external = covariance_external

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
  # Return

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    2x
                    
                      
  return(sim_covariates_obj)

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#' Summarize the number of continuous and binary covariates

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#' in a `SimCovariates` object created by `sim_covariates()`

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#' @param sim_covariates_obj `SimCovariates`. Object returned by

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#' `sim_covariates()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#' @return data.frame showing covariate names and types as well as

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#' counts of binary and continuous covariates.

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
sim_covariates_summ <- function(sim_covariates_obj) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    !
                    
                      
  assert_class(sim_covariates_obj, "SimCovariates")

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    !
                    
                      
  df_list <- lapply(sim_covariates_obj@covariates, function(cov_i) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    !
                    
                      
    data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    !
                    
                      
      type = cov_i@type_string,

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    !
                    
                      
      int = cov_i@printval_int,

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    !
                    
                      
      ext = cov_i@printval_ext

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
  })

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    !
                    
                      
  out_df <- cbind(name = names(df_list), do.call(rbind, df_list))

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    !
                    
                      
  rownames(out_df) <- NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    !
                    
                      
  attributes(out_df)$n_cat <- sum(vapply(sim_covariates_obj@covariates, is, class2 = "SimVarCont", logical(1)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    !
                    
                      
  attributes(out_df)$n_bin <- sum(vapply(sim_covariates_obj@covariates, is, class2 = "SimVarBin", logical(1)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    !
                    
                      
  return(out_df)

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "SimCovariates",

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    !
                    
                      
    summ <- sim_covariates_summ(object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("SimCovariates Object\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(paste0(attributes(summ)$n_cat), " categorical covariate(s)\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(paste0(attributes(summ)$n_bin), " binary covariate(s)\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    !
                    
                      
    print(summ)

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Plot Prior Objects

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Plot prior distributions as densities. Continuous distributions are plotted as curves and

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' discrete distributions as bar plots.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @name plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @aliases plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param x Object inheriting from `Prior`

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param y Not used.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param add logical. Add density to existing plot.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ... Optional arguments for plotting.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' Plot ranges are selected by default to show 99% of the density for unbounded distributions.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' The limits can be changed by specifying `xlim = c(lower, upper)`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' Colors, line types, and other typical [par()] parameters can be used.

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
if (!isGeneric("plot")) setGeneric("plot", function(x, y, ...) standardGeneric("plot"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' Get Variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @name get_vars

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @aliases get_vars

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object Object

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' @returns A `character` vector containing variable names

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    223x

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37

                    38

                    41

                    42

                    43

                    44

                    45

                    50

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' `PoissonPrior` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for defining poisson priors to be translated to Stan code.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Objects of class `PoissonPrior` should not be created directly but by

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' the constructor [poisson_prior()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot stan_code character. Stan implementation of the prior, with

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' placeholders for poisson stan function parameters surrounded with

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' `{{` and `}}` to be replaced with [glue::glue()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot n_param integer. Number of prior parameters (1).

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot constraint character. Support of prior distribution,

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' `"<lower=0>"`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot lambda numeric. Rate (>0).

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @include prior_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @family prior classes

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
.poisson_prior <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
  "PoissonPrior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
  contains = "Prior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(lambda = "numeric"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
  prototype = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
    n_param = 1L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
    stan_code = "poisson({{object@lambda}})",

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
    constraint = "<lower=0>"

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
  validity = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
    if (object@lambda <= 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
      return("lambda must be >0")

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
    return(TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' Prior poisson distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @param lambda numeric. Rate (>0).

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' Stan reference <https://mc-stan.org/docs/functions-reference/poisson.html>

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Object of class [`PoissonPrior`][PoissonPrior-class].

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @family priors

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' pp <- poisson_prior(100)

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
poisson_prior <- function(lambda) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    5x
                    
                      
  .poisson_prior(lambda = lambda)

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "PoissonPrior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    1x
                    
                      
    cat("Poisson Distribution\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    1x
                    
                      
    cat("Parameters:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    1x
                    
                      
    print.data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    1x
                    
                      
      data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    1x
                    
                      
        Stan = c("lambda"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    1x
                    
                      
        R = c("lambda"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    1x
                    
                      
        Value = c(object@lambda)

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
      ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    1x
                    
                      
      row.names = FALSE, right = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (object@constraint != "") print(h_glue("Constraints: {{object@constraint}}"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
# plot ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' plot(poisson_prior(5), xlim = c(0, 15))

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
  f = "plot",

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
  signature = c("PoissonPrior", "missing"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(x, y, add = FALSE, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    1x
                    
                      
    limits <- stats::qpois(c(0.005, 0.995), lambda = x@lambda)

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    1x
                    
                      
    density_fun <- function(values) stats::dpois(values, lambda = x@lambda)

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    1x
                    
                      
    dist_type <- "discrete"

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    1x
                    
                      
    callNextMethod(default_limits = limits, density_fun = density_fun, dist_type = dist_type, add = add, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' `SimCovariateList` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for covariate details as part of a simulation study.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'  Objects of class `SimCovariateList` should not be created

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' directly but by the constructor `sim_covariate_list()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot covariate_list named list of object of class `Covariate`, one object

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' for each parameter variation.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @include covariate_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @include add_covariates.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @include analysis_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
.sim_covariate_list <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
  "SimCovariateList",

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
    covariate_list = "list",

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
    guide = "data.frame"

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
  validity = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
    if (!all(vapply(object@covariate_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
      function(item) is(item, "CovariatesOrNULL"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
      FUN.VALUE = logical(1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
    ))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
      return("`covariate_list` must be a list of `Covariate` objects (or `NULL`)")

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
    if (is.null(names(object@covariate_list))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
      return("`covariate_list` must be named.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
    if (any(names(object@covariate_list) == "")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
      return("All items in `covariate_list` must be named.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
    if (length(unique(names(object@covariate_list))) != length(names(object@covariate_list))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
      return("All names supplied to `covariate_list` must be unique.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' Input covariate adjustment details for a simulation study

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' A function for defining which covariate adjustment scenarios should be evaluated as

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' part of a simulation study.

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'
