    assert_numeric(iter_sampling)

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    1x
                    
                      
    assert_numeric(chains)

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    1x
                    
                      
    assert_flag(verbose)

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (!isTRUE(x@ready_to_sample)) stop("Cannot sample object. Create object using `create_analysis_obj()`")

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    !
                    
                      
    if (verbose) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    !
                    
                      
      x@model$sample(

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    !
                    
                      
        data = prepare_stan_data_inputs(x),

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    !
                    
                      
        iter_warmup = iter_warmup,

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    !
                    
                      
        iter_sampling = iter_sampling,

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    !
                    
                      
        chains = chains,

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
        ...

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    !
                    
                      
      suppressMessages(

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    !
                    
                      
        x@model$sample(

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    !
                    
                      
          data = prepare_stan_data_inputs(x),

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    !
                    
                      
          iter_warmup = iter_warmup,

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    !
                    
                      
          iter_sampling = iter_sampling,

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    !
                    
                      
          chains = chains,

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
          refresh = 0L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
          ...

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#' Sample from Stan model contained in `Simulation` object

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#' @param posterior_quantiles numeric vector of length two.

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#' The posterior quantiles used for summarizing simulation results. The

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
#' default is `c(0.025, 0.975)` See details.

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
#' @param iter_warmup integer. The number of warm up iterations to run per chain.

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
#' The default is 1000.

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
#' @param iter_sampling integer. The number of post-warm up iterations to run per chain.

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
#' The default is 10000.

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
#' @param chains integer. The number of Markov chains to run. The default is 4.

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
#' @param keep_cmd_stan_models logical. Whether to keep the

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
#' `CmdStanModel` objects from the `mcmc_sampler` (`TRUE`,

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#' discouraged in most scenarios) or not (`FALSE`). The default is `FALSE`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#' @param verbose logical. Whether to print sampler updates (`TRUE`) or not

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
#' (`FALSE`)

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
#' @include create_simulation_obj.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname mcmc_sample

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#' @return An object of class `MCMCSimulationResult`

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#' ## Simulation objects

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#' This function takes draws from an MCMC sampler and summarizes

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
#' results. Several metrics are summarized:

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#' \itemize{

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#'   \item{"Type 1 error"}{ This is the probability that the posterior

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#'   treatment effect distribution excludes the true value.}

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
#' ## Simulation objects

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
#' base_mat <- matrix(

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
#'   c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(0, 200), rep(0, 200), rep(1, 200),

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(1, 200), rep(0, 200), rep(0, 200),

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(0, 600)

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
#'   ncol = 3,

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
#'   dimnames = list(NULL, c("ext", "trt", "driftOR"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#' add_binary_endpoint <- function(odds_ratio,

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#'                                 base_matrix = base_mat) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#'   linear_predictor <- base_matrix[, "trt"] * log(odds_ratio)

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
#'   prob <- 1 / (1 + exp(-linear_predictor))

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
#'   bin_endpoint <- rbinom(

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
#'     NROW(base_matrix),

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    
                    
                      
#'     1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    
                    
                      
#'     prob

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    
                    
                      
#'   cbind(base_matrix, matrix(bin_endpoint, ncol = 1, dimnames = list(NULL, "ep")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    
                    
                      
#' data_list <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    
                    
                      
#'   list(add_binary_endpoint(1.5), add_binary_endpoint(1.5)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    
                    
                      
#'   list(add_binary_endpoint(2.5), add_binary_endpoint(2.5))

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
#' guide <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      
#'   trueOR = c(1.5, 2.5),

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
#'   driftOR = c(1.0, 1.0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
#'   index = 1:2

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    
                    
                      
#' sdl <- sim_data_list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_list = data_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
#'   guide = guide,

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
#'   effect = "trueOR",

                    		
                  

                  

                    169
                    
                    
                      
#'   drift = "driftOR",

                    		
                  

                  

                    170
                    
                    
                      
#'   index = "index"

                    		
                  

                  

                    171
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    172
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    173
                    
                    
                      
#' sim_object <- create_simulation_obj(

                    		
                  

                  

                    174
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_matrix_list = sdl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    175
                    
                    
                      
#'   outcome = logistic_bin_outcome("ep", normal_prior(0, 1000)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    176
                    
                    
                      
#'   borrowing = sim_borrowing_list(list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    177
                    
                    
                      
#'     full_borrowing = borrowing_details("Full borrowing", "ext"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    178
                    
                    
                      
#'     bdb = borrowing_details("BDB", "ext", exponential_prior(0.0001))

                    		
                  

                  

                    179
                    
                    
                      
#'   )),

                    		
                  

                  

                    180
                    
                    
                      
#'   treatment = treatment_details("trt", normal_prior(0, 1000))

                    		
                  

                  

                    181
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    182
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    183
                    
                    
                      
#' mcmc_sample(sim_object, chains = 1, iter_warmup = 500L, iter_sampling = 1000L)

                    		
                  

                  

                    184
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    185
                    
                    
                      
  "mcmc_sample",

                    		
                  

                  

                    186
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "Simulation",

                    		
                  

                  

                    187
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(x,

                    		
                  

                  

                    188
                    
                    
                      
                        posterior_quantiles = c(0.025, 0.975),

                    		
                  

                  

                    189
                    
                    
                      
                        iter_warmup = 1000L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    190
                    
                    
                      
                        iter_sampling = 10000L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    191
                    
                    
                      
                        chains = 4L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    192
                    
                    
                      
                        verbose = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    193
                    
                    
                      
                        keep_cmd_stan_models = FALSE,

                    		
                  

                  

                    194
                    
                    
                      
                        ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    195
                    
                    
                      
    # Input checks

                    		
                  

                  

                    196
                    !
                    
                      
    assert_class(x, "Simulation")

                    		
                  

                  

                    197
                    !
                    
                      
    assert_numeric(posterior_quantiles)

                    		
                  

                  

                    198
                    !
                    
                      
    assert_vector(posterior_quantiles, len = 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    199
                    !
                    
                      
    assert_numeric(iter_warmup)

                    		
                  

                  

                    200
                    !
                    
                      
    assert_numeric(iter_sampling)

                    		
                  

                  

                    201
                    !
                    
                      
    assert_numeric(chains)

                    		
                  

                  

                    202
                    !
                    
                      
    assert_flag(verbose)

                    		
                  

                  

                    203
                    !
                    
                      
    assert_flag(keep_cmd_stan_models)

                    		
                  

                  

                    204
                    !
                    
                      
    if (any(posterior_quantiles < 0 | posterior_quantiles > 1)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    205
                    !
                    
                      
      stop("`posterior_quantiles` must be [0, 1]")

                    		
                  

                  

                    206
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    207
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    208
                    
                    
                      
    # Message if `keep_cmd_stan_models` = `TRUE`

                    		
                  

                  

                    209
                    !
                    
                      
    if (keep_cmd_stan_models) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    210
                    !
                    
                      
      message("Creating ", x@n_analyses, " `draws` objects! ")

                    		
                  

                  

                    211
                    !
                    
                      
      if (x@n_analyses > 20) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    212
                    !
                    
                      
        message("This is a lot! You may consider `keep_cmd_stan_models` = `FALSE`.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    213
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    214
                    !
                    
                      
      cmd_stan_models_out <- list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    215
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    216
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    217
                    
                    
                      
    # Create object

                    		
                  

                  

                    218
                    !
                    
                      
    mcmc_simulation_result <- .mcmc_simulation_result(

                    		
                  

                  

                    219
                    !
                    
                      
      results = x@guide

                    		
                  

                  

                    220
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    221
                    !
                    
                      
    mcmc_simulation_result@results$true_coverage <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    222
                    !
                    
                      
      mcmc_simulation_result@results$null_coverage <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    223
                    !
                    
                      
      mcmc_simulation_result@results$bias_mean <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    224
                    !
                    
                      
      mcmc_simulation_result@results$mse_mean <-

                    		
                  

                  

                    225
                    !
                    
                      
      rep(NA_real_, x@n_combos)

                    		
                  

                  

                    226
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    227
                    
                    
                      
    # MCMC sample

                    		
                  

                  

                    228
                    !
                    
                      
    for (i in 1:x@n_combos) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    229
                    
                    
                      
      # Create a list for `cmd_stan_models`

                    		
                  

                  

                    230
                    !
                    
                      
      if (keep_cmd_stan_models) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    231
                    !
                    
                      
        cmd_stan_models_out[[i]] <- list()

                    		
                  

                  

                    232
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    233
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    234
                    
                    
                      
      # Important values

                    		
                  

                  

                    235
                    !
                    
                      
      n_sim <- NROW(x@analysis_obj_list[[i]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    236
                    !
                    
                      
      true_effect <- x@guide[i, x@data_matrix_list@effect]

                    		
                  

                  

                    237
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    238
                    
                    
                      
      # Placeholder objects

                    		
                  

                  

                    239
                    !
                    
                      
      true_coverage <- null_coverage <- vector(mode = "integer", length = n_sim)

                    		
                  

                  

                    240
                    !
                    
                      
      bias <- mse <- vector(mode = "numeric", length = n_sim)

                    		
                  

                  

                    241
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    242
                    !
                    
                      
      for (j in 1:n_sim) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    243
                    !
                    
                      
        anls_obj <- x@analysis_obj_list[[i]][[j]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    244
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    245
                    !
                    
                      
        mcmc_results <- mcmc_sample(

                    		
                  

                  

                    246
                    !
                    
                      
          anls_obj,

                    		
                  

                  

                    247
                    !
                    
                      
          iter_warmup = iter_warmup,

                    		
                  

                  

                    248
                    !
                    
                      
          iter_sampling = iter_sampling,

                    		
                  

                  

                    249
                    !
                    
                      
          chains = chains,

                    		
                  

                  

                    250
                    !
                    
                      
          verbose = verbose,

                    		
                  

                  

                    251
                    
                    
                      
          ...

                    		
                  

                  

                    252
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    253
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    254
                    !
                    
                      
        draws <- mcmc_results$draws()

                    		
                  

                  

                    255
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    256
                    
                    
                      
        # Coverage

                    		
                  

                  

                    257
                    !
                    
                      
        true_coverage[j] <- sim_is_true_effect_covered(

                    		
                  

                  

                    258
                    !
                    
                      
          draws,

                    		
                  

                  

                    259
                    !
                    
                      
          true_effect,

                    		
                  

                  

                    260
                    !
                    
                      
          posterior_quantiles

                    		
                  

                  

                    261
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    262
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    263
                    !
                    
                      
        null_coverage[j] <- sim_is_null_effect_covered(

                    		
                  

                  

                    264
                    !
                    
                      
          draws,

                    		
                  

                  

                    265
                    !
                    
                      
          posterior_quantiles

                    		
                  

                  

                    266
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    267
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    268
                    
                    
                      
        # Bias

                    		
                  

                  

                    269
                    !
                    
                      
        bias[j] <- sim_estimate_bias(

                    		
                  

                  

                    270
                    !
                    
                      
          draws,

                    		
                  

                  

                    271
                    !
                    
                      
          true_effect

                    		
                  

                  

                    272
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    273
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    274
                    
                    
                      
        # MSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    275
                    !
                    
                      
        mse[j] <- sim_estimate_mse(

                    		
                  

                  

                    276
                    !
                    
                      
          draws,

                    		
                  

                  

                    277
                    !
                    
                      
          true_effect

                    		
                  

                  

                    278
                    
                    
                      
        )

                    		
                  

                  

                    279
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    280
                    
                    
                      
        # Save draws if desired

                    		
                  

                  

                    281
                    !
                    
                      
        if (keep_cmd_stan_models) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    282
                    !
                    
                      
          cmd_stan_models_out[[i]][[j]] <- mcmc_results

                    		
                  

                  

                    283
                    
                    
                      
        } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    284
                    !
                    
                      
          for (file in mcmc_results$output_files()) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    285
                    !
                    
                      
            file.remove(file)

                    		
                  

                  

                    286
                    
                    
                      
          }

                    		
                  

                  

                    287
                    !
                    
                      
          rm(mcmc_results)

                    		
                  

                  

                    288
                    
                    
                      
        }

                    		
                  

                  

                    289
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    290
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    291
                    
                    
                      
      # Add simulation study results

                    		
                  

                  

                    292
                    !
                    
                      
      mcmc_simulation_result@results$true_coverage[[i]] <- mean(true_coverage)

                    		
                  

                  

                    293
                    !
                    
                      
      mcmc_simulation_result@results$null_coverage[[i]] <- mean(null_coverage)

                    		
                  

                  

                    294
                    !
                    
                      
      mcmc_simulation_result@results$bias_mean[[i]] <- mean(bias)

                    		
                  

                  

                    295
                    !
                    
                      
      mcmc_simulation_result@results$mse_mean[[i]] <- mean(mse)

                    		
                  

                  

                    296
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    297
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    298
                    
                    
                      
    # Attach draws

                    		
                  

                  

                    299
                    !
                    
                      
    if (keep_cmd_stan_models) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    300
                    !
                    
                      
      mcmc_simulation_result@cmd_stan_models <- cmd_stan_models_out

                    		
                  

                  

                    301
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    302
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    303
                    
                    
                      
    # Return object

                    		
                  

                  

                    304
                    !
                    
                      
    return(mcmc_simulation_result)

                    		
                  

                  

                    305
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    306
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
# class union----

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
setClassUnion("listOrPrior", c("list", "Prior"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' `Covariate` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for defining covariate details. Objects of class

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' `Covariate` should not be created directly but by the constructor

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' [add_covariates()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot covariates character. Names of columns in the data matrix containing

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' covariates to be adjusted for in the outcome model. Note: the

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' external and treatment flags should not go here.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot priors. Either a single object of class `Prior` specifying the prior

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' distribution to apply to all covariates or a named list of

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' distributions of class `Prior`, one for each covariate

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @include prior_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
.covariate_class <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
  "Covariates",

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
    covariates = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
    priors = "listOrPrior"

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
  validity = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
    if (is(object@priors, "list")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
      if (NROW(object@priors) != NROW(object@covariates)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
        return(paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
          "Either specify 1 prior distribution for all ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
          "covariates, or specify a named list with 1 prior per ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
          "covariate"

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
        ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
      if (!all(vapply(object@priors, is, logical(1L), class2 = "Prior"))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
        return(paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
          "If a list is provided to specify priors, all priors ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
          "must be of class `Prior`"

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
        ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
      if (!all(names(object@priors) %in% object@covariates)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
        return(paste0(

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
          "If a list is provided to specify priors, one prior per ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
          "covariate must be provided."

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
        ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
    return(TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "Covariates",

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("Covariate object with priors for variables:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(toString(object@covariates), "\n\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    !
                    
                      
    if (is(object@priors, "Prior")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    !
                    
                      
      cat("Prior for all covariate coefficients:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    !
                    
                      
      show(object@priors)

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    !
                    
                      
    } else if (is(object@priors, "list")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    !
                    
                      
      for (i in object@covariates) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    !
                    
                      
        cat("Prior for ", i, ":\n", sep = "")

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    !
                    
                      
        show(object@priors[[i]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    !
                    
                      
        cat("\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
# get_vars ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname get_vars

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' @include generics.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
  f = "get_vars",

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "Covariates",

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    21x
                    
                      
    c(object@covariates)

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' `SimBorrowingList` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for borrowing details as part of a simulation study.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'  Objects of class `SimBorrowingList` should not be created

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' directly but by the constructor `sim_borrowing_list()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot borrowing_list named list of object of class `Borrowing`, one object

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' for each parameter variation.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @include borrowing_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @include borrowing_details.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
.sim_borrowing_list <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
  "SimBorrowingList",

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
    borrowing_list = "list",

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
    guide = "data.frame"

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
  validity = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
    if (!all(vapply(object@borrowing_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
      function(item) is(item, "Borrowing"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
      FUN.VALUE = logical(1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
    ))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
      return("`borrowing_list` must be a list of `Borrowing` objects.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
    if (is.null(names(object@borrowing_list))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
      return("`borrowing_list` must be named.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
    if (any(names(object@borrowing_list) == "")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
      return("All items in `borrowing_list` must be named.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
    if (length(unique(names(object@borrowing_list))) != length(names(object@borrowing_list))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
      return("All names supplied to `borrowing_list` must be unique.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' Input borrowing details for a simulation study

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' A function for defining which borrowing scenarios should be evaluated as

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' part of a simulation study.

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' @param borrowing_list named list of objects of class `Borrowing` created

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' by `borrowing_details()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @family simulation classes

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' borrow_scenarios <- sim_borrowing_list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'   list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'     "No borrowing" = borrowing_details("No borrowing", "ext"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Full borrowing" = borrowing_details("Full borrowing", "ext"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#'     "BDB, uninformative prior" = borrowing_details("BDB", "ext", gamma_prior(0.001, 0.001)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'     "BDB, informative prior" = borrowing_details("BDB", "ext", gamma_prior(1, 0.001))

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
sim_borrowing_list <- function(borrowing_list) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    10x
                    
                      
  borrow <- .sim_borrowing_list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    10x
                    
                      
    borrowing_list = borrowing_list

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    5x
                    
                      
  borrow@guide <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    5x
                    
                      
    borrowing_scenario = names(borrow@borrowing_list)

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    5x
                    
                      
  borrow

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "SimBorrowingList",

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("SimBorrowingList object with ", NROW(object@borrowing_list), " different scenario(s)\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    !
                    
                      
    if (NROW(object@borrowing_list) <= 10) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    !
                    
                      
      print(object@guide)

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
# get_vars ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname get_vars

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#' @include generics.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
  f = "get_vars",

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "SimBorrowingList",

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    2x
                    
                      
    unique(vapply(object@borrowing_list, get_vars, character(1)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' `SimVar` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A parent class for defining covariates to be created in the simulation study

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' calls to `add_covariates()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
  "SimVar",

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
  contains = "VIRTUAL"

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' `SimVarCont` class

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' A constructor for making objects of class `SimVarCont`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' Objects of class `SimVarCont` are used to hold mean values of

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' of continuous variables specified in a simulation study.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot mu_internal numeric. Mean covariate value for the internal arms.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot mu_external numeric. Mean covariate value for the external arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot printval_int numeric. Value to print to summarize internal arms.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot printval_ext numeric. Value to print to summarize external arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot type_string character. 'continuous'

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @family simvar classes

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
.cont_var <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
  "SimVarCont",
