                    24
                    
                    
                      
  contains = "SimVar",

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
    mu_internal = "numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
    mu_external = "numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
    printval_int = "numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
    printval_ext = "numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
    type_string = "character"

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
  prototype = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
    type_string = "continuous"

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' Create continuous covariate

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' Create an object of class `SimVarCont` to hold mean values of

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' of continuous variables specified in a simulation study.

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @param mu_internal numeric. Mean covariate value for the internal arms.

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' @param mu_external numeric. Mean covariate value for the external arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @family simvar

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' cv1 <- cont_var(0.5, 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' cv2 <- cont_var(10, 10)

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
cont_var <- function(mu_internal,

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
                     mu_external) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    13x
                    
                      
  expect_numeric(mu_internal)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    12x
                    
                      
  expect_numeric(mu_external)

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    11x
                    
                      
  .cont_var(

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    11x
                    
                      
    mu_internal = mu_internal,

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    11x
                    
                      
    mu_external = mu_external,

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    11x
                    
                      
    printval_int = mu_internal,

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    11x
                    
                      
    printval_ext = mu_external

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "SimVarCont",

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("Continuous variable\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(glue::glue("internal mean: {object@mu_internal}, external mean: {object@mu_external}"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' `SimVarBin` class

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' A constructor for making objects of class `SimVarBin`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#' Objects of class `SimVarBin` are used to hold proportions of

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' binary variables specified in a simulation study.

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot prob_internal numeric. Proportion for the internal arms.

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot prob_external numeric. Proportion for the external arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot mu_internal_before_bin numeric. Mean value of covariate before binarization for

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#' the internal arms.

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot mu_external_before_bin numeric. Mean value of covariate before binarization for

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#' the external arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot printval_int numeric. Value to print to summarize internal arms.

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot printval_ext numeric. Value to print to summarize external arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot type_string character. 'binary'

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#' @family simvar classes

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
.bin_var <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
  "SimVarBin",

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
  contains = "SimVar",

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
    prob_internal = "numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
    prob_external = "numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
    mu_internal_before_bin = "numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
    mu_external_before_bin = "numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
    printval_int = "numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
    printval_ext = "numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
    type_string = "character"

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
  validity = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
    if (object@prob_internal < 0 | object@prob_internal > 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
      return("`prob_internal` must be [0, 1]")

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
    if (object@prob_external < 0 | object@prob_external > 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
      return("`prob_external` must be [0, 1]")

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
  },

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
  prototype = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
    type_string = "binary"

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
#' Create binary covariate

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    
                    
                      
#' Create an object of class `SimVarBin` to hold proportions of binary

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
#' variables specified in a simulation study.

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    
                    
                      
#' @param prob_internal numeric. Proportion for the internal arms.

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    
                    
                      
#' @param prob_external numeric. Proportion for the external arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
#' @param mu_internal_before_bin numeric. Mean value of the covariate before binarization

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
#' for the internal arms. The default is 0. See `details` for more information.

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
#' @param mu_external_before_bin numeric. Mean value of the covariate before binarization

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
#' for the external arm. The default is 0. See `details` for more information.

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
#' This function contains information necessary to create binary covariates

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
#' as part of a simulation study. The binary covariates are created

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    
                    
                      
#' by binarizing multivariate normal distributions to achieve

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
#' the probabilities specified in `prob_internal` and `prob_external`. The

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    
                    
                      
#' user may choose to change the default mean value of each variable

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    
                    
                      
#' prior to binarization by specifying `mu_internal_before_bin` or

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    
                    
                      
#' `mu_external_before_bin` to ensure the correct scales are used in the

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    
                    
                      
#' covariance matrix, though the ultimate proportions will depend on

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    
                    
                      
#' `prob_internal` and `prob_external`. The default values for

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
#' `mu_internal_before_bin` and `mu_external_before_bin` are `0`, and

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
#' it is not recommended to change these without good reason.

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    137
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    138
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    139
                    
                    
                      
#' @family simvar

                    		
                  

                  

                    140
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    141
                    
                    
                      
#' cv1 <- bin_var(0.50, 0.80)

                    		
                  

                  

                    142
                    
                    
                      
#' cv2 <- bin_var(.95, .92)

                    		
                  

                  

                    143
                    
                    
                      
bin_var <- function(prob_internal,

                    		
                  

                  

                    144
                    
                    
                      
                    prob_external,

                    		
                  

                  

                    145
                    
                    
                      
                    mu_internal_before_bin = 0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    146
                    
                    
                      
                    mu_external_before_bin = 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    147
                    23x
                    
                      
  expect_numeric(prob_internal)

                    		
                  

                  

                    148
                    23x
                    
                      
  expect_numeric(prob_external)

                    		
                  

                  

                    149
                    22x
                    
                      
  expect_numeric(mu_internal_before_bin)

                    		
                  

                  

                    150
                    22x
                    
                      
  expect_numeric(mu_external_before_bin)

                    		
                  

                  

                    151
                    22x
                    
                      
  .bin_var(

                    		
                  

                  

                    152
                    22x
                    
                      
    prob_internal = prob_internal,

                    		
                  

                  

                    153
                    22x
                    
                      
    prob_external = prob_external,

                    		
                  

                  

                    154
                    22x
                    
                      
    mu_internal_before_bin = mu_internal_before_bin,

                    		
                  

                  

                    155
                    22x
                    
                      
    mu_external_before_bin = mu_external_before_bin,

                    		
                  

                  

                    156
                    22x
                    
                      
    printval_int = prob_internal,

                    		
                  

                  

                    157
                    22x
                    
                      
    printval_ext = prob_external

                    		
                  

                  

                    158
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    159
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    160
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    161
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    162
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    163
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "SimVarBin",

                    		
                  

                  

                    164
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    165
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("Binary variable\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    166
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(glue::glue("internal probability: {object@prob_internal}, external probability: {object@prob_external}"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    167
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    168
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' `NormalPrior` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for defining normal priors to be translated to Stan code.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Objects of class `NormalPrior` should not be created directly but by

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' the constructor [normal_prior()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot stan_code character. Stan implementation of the prior, with

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' placeholders for normal stan function parameters surrounded with

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' `{{` and `}}` to be replaced with [glue::glue()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot n_param integer. Number of prior parameters (2).

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot constraint character. Support of prior distribution,

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' (all values allowed in normal distribution).

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot mu numeric. Location.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot sigma numeric. Scale (>0).

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @include prior_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @family prior classes

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
.normal_prior <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
  "NormalPrior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
  contains = "Prior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
    mu = "numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
    sigma = "numeric"

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  prototype = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
    n_param = 2L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
    stan_code = "normal({{object@mu}}, {{object@sigma}})",

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
    constraint = ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
  validity = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
    if (object@sigma <= 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
      return("sigma must be >0")

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
    return(TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' Prior normal distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' @param mu numeric. Location.

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @param sigma numeric. Scale (>0).

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' Stan reference <https://mc-stan.org/docs/functions-reference/normal-distribution.html>

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Object of class [`NormalPrior`][NormalPrior-class].

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @family priors

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' np <- normal_prior(1, 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
normal_prior <- function(mu, sigma) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    214x
                    
                      
  .normal_prior(mu = mu, sigma = sigma)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "NormalPrior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    1x
                    
                      
    cat("Normal Distribution\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    1x
                    
                      
    cat("Parameters:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    1x
                    
                      
    print.data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    1x
                    
                      
      data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    1x
                    
                      
        Stan = c("mu", "sigma"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    1x
                    
                      
        R = c("mean", "sd"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    1x
                    
                      
        Value = c(object@mu, object@sigma)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
      ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    1x
                    
                      
      row.names = FALSE, right = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    !
                    
                      
    if (object@constraint != "") print(h_glue("Constraints: {{object@constraint}}"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
# plot ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' plot(normal_prior(1, 2))

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
  f = "plot",

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
  signature = c("NormalPrior", "missing"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(x, y, add = FALSE, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    1x
                    
                      
    limits <- stats::qnorm(c(0.005, 0.995), mean = x@mu, sd = x@sigma)

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    1x
                    
                      
    density_fun <- function(values) stats::dnorm(values, mean = x@mu, sd = x@sigma)

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    1x
                    
                      
    dist_type <- "continuous"

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    1x
                    
                      
    callNextMethod(default_limits = limits, density_fun = density_fun, dist_type = dist_type, add = add, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#' Check Data Matrix for Required Columns

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Check that an `Analysis` object's `data_matrix` has all the required variables.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object `Analysis`. Object to check.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @return `stop()` if some columns are missing.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' anls <- psborrow2:::.analysis_obj(

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_matrix = example_matrix,

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   covariates = add_covariates(

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'     covariates = c("cov1", "cov2"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'     priors = normal_prior(0, 1000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   outcome = exp_surv_dist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'     "time",

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'     "cnsr",

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'     baseline_prior = normal_prior(0, 1000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   borrowing = borrowing_details(

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'     "BDB",

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'     "ext",

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'     exponential_prior(.001)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   treatment = treatment_details(

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'     "trt",

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'     normal_prior(0, 1000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'   ready_to_sample = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' check_data_matrix_has_columns(anls)

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
check_data_matrix_has_columns <- function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    20x
                    
                      
  assert_class(object, "Analysis")

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    20x
                    
                      
  data_cols <- colnames(object@data_matrix)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    20x
                    
                      
  error_col <- c()

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    20x
                    
                      
  if (!get_vars(object@treatment) %in% data_cols) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    1x
                    
                      
    error_col <- c(error_col, get_vars(object@treatment))

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    20x
                    
                      
  if (!get_vars(object@borrowing) %in% data_cols) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    !
                    
                      
    error_col <- c(error_col, get_vars(object@borrowing))

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    20x
                    
                      
  missing_covs <- setdiff(get_vars(object@covariates), data_cols)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (length(missing_covs)) error_col <- c(error_col, covariates = toString(missing_covs))

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    20x
                    
                      
  if (any(missing_outcomes <- !get_vars(object@outcome) %in% data_cols)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    2x
                    
                      
    error_col <- c(error_col, get_vars(object@outcome)[missing_outcomes])

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    20x
                    
                      
  if (length(error_col)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    4x
                    
                      
    stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    4x
                    
                      
      "The following specified variables were not found in `data_matrix`:\n",

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    4x
                    
                      
      paste0("  ", names(error_col), ": ", error_col, "\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Prepare Stan data inputs

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Create a list of data in the correct format for Stan

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param analysis_obj `Analysis`. Object of class [`Analysis`][Analysis-class] created by

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' `create_analysis_obj()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Named list of data inputs that correspond to items in the

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' Stan data {} block.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @include create_analysis_obj.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' anls_obj <- create_analysis_obj(

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_matrix = example_matrix,

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   outcome = exp_surv_dist("time", "cnsr", normal_prior(0, 100)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   borrowing = borrowing_details(

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'     "BDB",

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'     "ext",

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'     exponential_prior(0.001)

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   treatment = treatment_details("trt", normal_prior(0, 100))

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' data_in <- psborrow2:::prepare_stan_data_inputs(anls_obj)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
prepare_stan_data_inputs <- function(analysis_obj) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
  ## Trimmed data matrix

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    9x
                    
                      
  trimmed_data_matrix <- trim_data_matrix(analysis_obj)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
  ## Common inputs

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    9x
                    
                      
  data_in <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    9x
                    
                      
    N = NROW(trimmed_data_matrix),

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    9x
                    
                      
    trt = trimmed_data_matrix[, analysis_obj@treatment@trt_flag_col]

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
  ## Outcome-specific additions

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    9x
                    
                      
  if (is(analysis_obj@outcome, "TimeToEvent")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    6x
                    
                      
    data_in[["time"]] <- trimmed_data_matrix[, analysis_obj@outcome@time_var]

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    6x
                    
                      
    data_in[["cens"]] <- trimmed_data_matrix[, analysis_obj@outcome@cens_var]

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    3x
                    
                      
  } else if (is(analysis_obj@outcome, "BinaryOutcome")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    3x
                    
                      
    data_in[["y"]] <- trimmed_data_matrix[, analysis_obj@outcome@binary_var]

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
  ## BDB additions

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    9x
                    
                      
  if (analysis_obj@borrowing@method == "BDB") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    5x
                    
                      
    data_in[["Z"]] <- cbind(

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    5x
                    
                      
      1 - trimmed_data_matrix[, analysis_obj@borrowing@ext_flag_col],

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    5x
                    
                      
      trimmed_data_matrix[, analysis_obj@borrowing@ext_flag_col]

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    5x
                    
                      
    ) # Column 1 is the indicator for internal. Column 2 is the external indicator.

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
  ## Covariate additions

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    9x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(analysis_obj@covariates)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    6x
                    
                      
    data_in[["K"]] <- NROW(analysis_obj@covariates@covariates)

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    6x
                    
                      
    data_in[["X"]] <- trimmed_data_matrix[, analysis_obj@covariates@covariates, drop = FALSE]

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    6x
                    
                      
    beta_constraints <- get_covariate_constraints(analysis_obj@covariates)

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    6x
                    
                      
    data_in[["L_beta"]] <- beta_constraints[, "lower"]

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    6x
                    
                      
    data_in[["U_beta"]] <- beta_constraints[, "upper"]

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
  ## Weights

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    9x
                    
                      
  if (analysis_obj@outcome@weight_var != "") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    1x
                    
                      
    data_in[["weight"]] <- trimmed_data_matrix[, analysis_obj@outcome@weight_var]

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    9x
                    
                      
  return(data_in)

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' What is the bias for a given model

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @param draws draws_array Object of class `draws` from

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' `CmdStanMCMC$draws()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param true_effect numeric. The true treatment effect.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @return the bias of the sample

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' Bias will be calculated as (true_effect - median_estimated_effect)

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' base_mat <- matrix(

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(0, 200), rep(0, 200), rep(1, 200),

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(1, 200), rep(0, 200), rep(0, 200),

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(0, 600)

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'   ncol = 3,

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'   dimnames = list(NULL, c("ext", "trt", "driftOR"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' add_binary_endpoint <- function(odds_ratio,

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'                                 base_matrix = base_mat) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   linear_predictor <- base_matrix[, "trt"] * log(odds_ratio)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   prob <- 1 / (1 + exp(-linear_predictor))

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   bin_endpoint <- rbinom(

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'     NROW(base_matrix),

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'     1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'     prob

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'   cbind(base_matrix, matrix(bin_endpoint, ncol = 1, dimnames = list(NULL, "ep")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' data_list <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'   list(add_binary_endpoint(1.5), add_binary_endpoint(1.5)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'   list(add_binary_endpoint(2.5), add_binary_endpoint(2.5))

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' guide <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'   trueOR = c(1.5, 2.5),

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'   driftOR = c(1.0, 1.0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'   index = 1:2

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' sdl <- sim_data_list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_list = data_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'   guide = guide,

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'   effect = "trueOR",

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'   drift = "driftOR",

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'   index = "index"

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' x <- create_simulation_obj(

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_matrix_list = sdl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#'   outcome = logistic_bin_outcome("ep", normal_prior(0, 1000)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#'   borrowing = sim_borrowing_list(list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#'     full_borrowing = borrowing_details("Full borrowing", "ext"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#'     bdb = borrowing_details("BDB", "ext", exponential_prior(0.0001))

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#'   )),

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#'   treatment = treatment_details("trt", normal_prior(0, 1000))

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#' i <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#' j <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' true_effect <- x@guide[i, x@data_matrix_list@effect]

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#' anls_obj <- x@analysis_obj_list[[i]][[j]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' res <- mcmc_sample(anls_obj, iter_sampling = 500)

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' draws <- res$draws()

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#' psborrow2:::sim_estimate_bias(

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#'   draws,
