                    75
                    
                    
                      
#'   true_effect

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
sim_estimate_bias <- function(draws,

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
                              true_effect) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    !
                    
                      
  effect_index <- dimnames(draws)$variable %in% c("HR_trt", "OR_trt")

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    !
                    
                      
  bias <- mean(draws[, , effect_index] - true_effect)

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    !
                    
                      
  return(bias)

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' `WeibullPHSurvDist` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for defining a time-to-event survival analysis with a

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Weibull proportional hazards survival distribution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' Objects of class `WeibullPHSurvDist` should not be created directly

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' but by the constructor [weib_ph_surv_dist()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot function_stan_code character. Stan function code block containing text to interpolate into Stan model.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot param_stan_code character. Stan parameter code block containing text to interpolate into Stan model.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot likelihood_stan_code character. Stan model likelihood code block containing text

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' to interpolate into Stan model.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot n_param integer. Number of ancillary parameters for the model to estimate (1).

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot param_priors list. Named list of prior distributions on the ancillary parameters in the model.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot time_var character. Variable used for time in `TimeToEvent` objects.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot cens_var character. Variable used for censoring in `TimeToEvent` objects.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot baseline_prior `Prior`. Object of class `Prior`

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' specifying prior distribution for the baseline outcome.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @include outcome_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @include prior_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @include normal_prior.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' @include exponential_prior.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @family outcome

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
.weib_ph_surv_dist <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  "WeibullPHSurvDist",

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
  contains = "TimeToEvent",

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
  prototype = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
    n_param = 1L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
    function_stan_code =

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
      h_glue("

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
          real weibull_ph_lpdf(real y, real alpha, real lambda) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
              real lprob = log(alpha) + log(lambda) + (alpha - 1) * log(y) - lambda * (y^alpha);

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
              return lprob;

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
          }

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
          real weibull_ph_lcdf(real y, real alpha, real lambda) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
              real lprob = log(1-exp(-lambda * y^alpha));

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
              return lprob;

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
          }

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
          real weibull_ph_lccdf(real y, real alpha, real lambda) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
              real lprob = -lambda * y^alpha;

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
              return lprob;

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
          }

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
         "),

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
    likelihood_stan_code =

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
      h_glue("

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
         for (i in 1:N) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
            if (cens[i] == 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
               target += weibull_ph_lccdf(time[i] | shape_weibull, elp[i] );

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
            } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
               target += weibull_ph_lpdf(time[i] | shape_weibull, elp[i] );

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
            }

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
         }"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
    param_stan_code = "real<lower=0> shape_weibull; ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
    param_priors = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
      shape_weibull = exponential_prior(beta = 0.0001)

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
  validity = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
    check_class(object@param_priors[["shape_weibull"]], "Prior")

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
    return(TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' Weibull survival distribution (proportional hazards formulation)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#' @param time_var character. Name of time variable column in model matrix

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' @param cens_var character. Name of the censorship variable flag in model matrix

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#' @param weight_var character. Optional name of variable in model matrix for weighting the log likelihood.

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' @param shape_prior `Prior` class object for the Weibull shape

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' parameter. Default is `exponential_prior(beta = 0.0001)`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#' @param baseline_prior `Prior`. Object of class `Prior`

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#' specifying prior distribution for the baseline outcome.

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' See `Details` for more information.

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#' ## Baseline Prior

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#' The `baseline_prior` argument specifies the prior distribution for the

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#' baseline log hazard rate. The interpretation of the `baseline_prior` differs

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#' slightly between methods selected in `borrowing_details()`:

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
#' - \emph{'BDB'}: the `baseline_prior` for Bayesian Dynamic Borrowing refers

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
#' to the log hazard rate of the external control arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#' - \emph{'Full borrowing'} or \emph{'No borrowing'}: the `baseline_prior` for

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#' these borrowing methods refers to the log hazard rate for the

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#' internal control arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Object of class [`WeibullPHSurvDist`][WeibullPHSurvDist-class].

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#' @family outcome models

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#' ws <- weib_ph_surv_dist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#'   time_var = "time",

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#'   cens_var = "cens",

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
#'   shape_prior = exponential_prior(1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
#'   baseline_prior = normal_prior(0, 1000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
weib_ph_surv_dist <- function(time_var,

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
                              cens_var,

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
                              shape_prior,

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
                              baseline_prior,

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
                              weight_var = "") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    22x
                    
                      
  assert_string(time_var)

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    22x
                    
                      
  assert_string(cens_var)

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    21x
                    
                      
  assert_string(weight_var)

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    21x
                    
                      
  assert_class(shape_prior, "Prior")

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    21x
                    
                      
  assert_class(baseline_prior, "Prior")

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    21x
                    
                      
  has_weight <- isTRUE(weight_var != "")

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    21x
                    
                      
  .weib_ph_surv_dist(

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    21x
                    
                      
    time_var = time_var,

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    21x
                    
                      
    cens_var = cens_var,

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    21x
                    
                      
    weight_var = weight_var,

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    21x
                    
                      
    param_priors = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    21x
                    
                      
      shape_weibull = shape_prior

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    21x
                    
                      
    baseline_prior = baseline_prior,

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    21x
                    
                      
    likelihood_stan_code = h_glue(

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    
                    
                      
      "

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    21x
                    
                      
       for (i in 1:N) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    21x
                    
                      
          if (cens[i] == 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    21x
                    
                      
             target += weibull_ph_lccdf(time[i] | shape_weibull, elp[i] ){{weight}};

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
          } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    21x
                    
                      
             target += weibull_ph_lpdf(time[i] | shape_weibull, elp[i] ){{weight}};

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
          }

                    		
                  

                  

                    126
                    
                    
                      
       }",

                    		
                  

                  

                    127
                    21x
                    
                      
      weight = if (has_weight) " * weight[i]" else ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    128
                    
                    
                      
    ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    129
                    21x
                    
                      
    data_stan_code = h_glue("

                    		
                  

                  

                    130
                    21x
                    
                      
      vector[N] time;

                    		
                  

                  

                    131
                    21x
                    
                      
      vector[N] cens;

                    		
                  

                  

                    132
                    21x
                    
                      
      {{weight}}",

                    		
                  

                  

                    133
                    21x
                    
                      
      weight = if (has_weight) "vector[N] weight;" else ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    134
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    135
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    136
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Make list of analysis objects for class `Simulation`

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @param simulation_obj `Simulation`. Object of class [`Simulation`][Simulation-class]

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' created by `psborrow2:::.simulation_obj()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param quiet logical. Whether to print messages (`quiet = FALSE`) or not

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' (`quiet = TRUE`, the default)

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @return list of lists of `Analysis` objects

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @include create_simulation_obj.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' base_mat <- matrix(

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(0, 200), rep(0, 200), rep(1, 200),

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(1, 200), rep(0, 200), rep(0, 200),

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(0, 600)

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'   ncol = 3,

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'   dimnames = list(NULL, c("ext", "trt", "driftOR"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' add_binary_endpoint <- function(odds_ratio,

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'                                 base_matrix = base_mat) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   linear_predictor <- base_matrix[, "trt"] * log(odds_ratio)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   prob <- 1 / (1 + exp(-linear_predictor))

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   bin_endpoint <- rbinom(

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'     NROW(base_matrix),

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'     1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'     prob

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'   cbind(base_matrix, matrix(bin_endpoint, ncol = 1, dimnames = list(NULL, "ep")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' data_list <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'   list(add_binary_endpoint(1.5), add_binary_endpoint(1.5)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'   list(add_binary_endpoint(2.5), add_binary_endpoint(2.5))

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' guide <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'   trueOR = c(1.5, 2.5),

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'   driftOR = c(1.0, 1.0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'   index = 1:2

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' sdl <- sim_data_list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_list = data_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'   guide = guide,

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'   effect = "trueOR",

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'   drift = "driftOR",

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'   index = "index"

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' sim_object <- psborrow2:::.simulation_obj(

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_matrix_list = sdl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#'   outcome = sim_outcome_list(list(default = logistic_bin_outcome("ep", normal_prior(0, 1000)))),

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#'   covariate = sim_covariate_list(covariate_list = list(`No adjustment` = NULL)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#'   borrowing = sim_borrowing_list(list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#'     full_borrowing = borrowing_details("Full borrowing", "ext"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#'     bdb = borrowing_details("BDB", "ext", exponential_prior(0.0001))

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#'   )),

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#'   treatment = sim_treatment_list(list(default = treatment_details("trt", normal_prior(0, 1000))))

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#' sim_object@guide <- Reduce(

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#'   merge,

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#'   init = sim_object@data_matrix_list@guide,

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#'   x = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#'     sim_object@outcome@guide,

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#'     sim_object@borrowing@guide,

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#'     sim_object@covariate@guide,

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#'     sim_object@treatment@guide

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#' sim_object@n_combos <- NROW(sim_object@guide)

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#' sim_object@n_analyses <- sum(sim_object@guide$n_datasets_per_param)

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
#' psborrow2:::make_analysis_object_list(sim_object)

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
make_analysis_object_list <- function(simulation_obj,

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
                                      quiet = TRUE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
  # Create top-level empty list

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    1x
                    
                      
  analysis_obj_list <- vector("list", simulation_obj@n_combos)

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
  # Loop over top level in guide

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    1x
                    
                      
  for (i in seq_len(simulation_obj@n_combos)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    4x
                    
                      
    guide_row <- simulation_obj@guide[i, ]

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
    # Objects needed for `create_analysis_obj()`

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    4x
                    
                      
    covariates <- simulation_obj@covariate@covariate_list[[

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    4x
                    
                      
    guide_row[["covariate_scenario"]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
    ]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    4x
                    
                      
    outcome <- simulation_obj@outcome@outcome_list[[

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    4x
                    
                      
    guide_row[["outcome_scenario"]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
    ]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    4x
                    
                      
    borrowing <- simulation_obj@borrowing@borrowing_list[[

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    4x
                    
                      
    guide_row[["borrowing_scenario"]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
    ]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    4x
                    
                      
    treatment <- simulation_obj@treatment@treatment_list[[

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    4x
                    
                      
    guide_row[["treatment_scenario"]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
    ]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    4x
                    
                      
    data_matrix_list <- simulation_obj@data_matrix_list@data_list[[

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    4x
                    
                      
    guide_row[[simulation_obj@data_matrix_list@index]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
    ]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    4x
                    
                      
    analysis_obj_list[[i]] <- lapply(

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    4x
                    
                      
      data_matrix_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    4x
                    
                      
      FUN = create_analysis_obj,

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    4x
                    
                      
      covariates = covariates,

                    		
                  

                  

                    116
                    4x
                    
                      
      outcome = outcome,

                    		
                  

                  

                    117
                    4x
                    
                      
      borrowing = borrowing,

                    		
                  

                  

                    118
                    4x
                    
                      
      treatment = treatment,

                    		
                  

                  

                    119
                    4x
                    
                      
      quiet = quiet

                    		
                  

                  

                    120
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
  # Return simulation object

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    1x
                    
                      
  return(analysis_obj_list)

                    		
                  

                  

                    125
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
# union ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
setClassUnion("listOrNULL", c("list", "NULL"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' `MCMCSimulationResult` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for defining Simulation study results. Objects of class

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' `MCMCSimulationResult` should not be created directly but by

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' `mcmc_sample()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot results `data.frame`. The results of the simulation study summarized

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' in a `data.frame`

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot cmd_stan_models list. List of lists of `CmdStanmodels` corresponding to the

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' different parameters in `Simulation@guide` and different datasets in

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' `Simulation@data_matrix_list`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @include mcmc_sample.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
.mcmc_simulation_result <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
  "MCMCSimulationResult",

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
    results = "data.frame",

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
    cmd_stan_models = "listOrNULL"

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
  prototype = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
    cmd_stan_models = NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "MCMCSimulationResult",

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    !
                    
                      
      "`MCMCSimulationResult` object. ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    !
                    
                      
      "Call `get_results()` to save outputs as a data.frame"

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    !
                    
                      
    object@results

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
# get_results----

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname get_results

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
  f = "get_results",

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "MCMCSimulationResult",

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    !
                    
                      
    return(object@results)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
# get_cmd_stan_models----

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname get_cmd_stan_models

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
  f = "get_cmd_stan_models",

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "MCMCSimulationResult",

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    !
                    
                      
    return(object@cmd_stan_models)

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' `Treatment` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for defining treatment details. Objects of class

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' `Treatment` should not be created directly but by the constructor

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' [treatment_details()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot trt_flag_col character. Character specifying the name of the column

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' in the model matrix that corresponds to the treatment flag

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' (`1`/`0` or `TRUE`/`FALSE`). This identifies patients as belonging

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' to the experimental treatment arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot trt_prior `Prior`. Object of class `Prior` specifying the

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' prior distribution of the log effect estimate (log hazard ratio for

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' time to event endpoints and log odds ratio for binary endpoints).

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @include prior_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @include normal_prior.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
.treatment_class <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
  "Treatment",

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
    trt_flag_col = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
    trt_prior = "Prior"

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
  prototype = c(trt_prior = normal_prior(0, 1000)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
  validity = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
    return(TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "Treatment",

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("Treatment object\n\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("Treatment flag column:", object@trt_flag_col, "\n\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("Treatment effect prior:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    !
                    
                      
    show(object@trt_prior)

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
# get_vars ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname get_vars

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @include generics.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' get_vars(treatment_details(

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'   trt_flag_col = "treat_fl",

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'   trt_prior = normal_prior(0, 1000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' ))

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
  f = "get_vars",

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "Treatment",

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    51x
                    
                      
    c(trt_flag_col = object@trt_flag_col)

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Make model string of Stan's data block

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Create the Stan string encompassed by data `{}`

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param analysis_obj `Analysis`. Object of class [`Analysis`][Analysis-class] created by

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' `psborrow2:::.analysis_obj()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @return `glue` `character` containing the text for the data block.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' anls_obj <- psborrow2:::.analysis_obj(

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_matrix = example_matrix,

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   outcome = exp_surv_dist("time", "cnsr", normal_prior(0, 100)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   borrowing = borrowing_details(

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Full borrowing",

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'     "ext"

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   treatment = treatment_details("trt", normal_prior(0, 100))

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' psborrow2:::make_model_string_data(anls_obj)

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
make_model_string_data <- function(analysis_obj) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    20x
                    
                      
  outcome_string <- analysis_obj@outcome@data_stan_code

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    20x
                    
                      
  borrowing_string <- analysis_obj@borrowing@data_stan_code

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    20x
                    
                      
  covariate_string <- ifelse(

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    20x
                    
                      
    !is.null(analysis_obj@covariates),

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    20x
                    
                      
    h_glue("int<lower=0> K;

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    20x
                    
                      
     matrix[N, K] X;

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    20x
                    
                      
     vector[K] L_beta;

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    20x
                    
                      
     vector[K] U_beta;

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
     "),

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
    ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    20x
                    
                      
  data_string <- h_glue("data {

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    20x
                    
                      
    int<lower=0> N;

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    20x
                    
                      
    vector[N] trt;

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    20x
                    
                      
    {{outcome_string}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    20x
                    
                      
    {{borrowing_string}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    20x
                    
                      
    {{covariate_string}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
  }")

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    20x
                    
                      
  data_string

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
# class unions ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
setClassUnion("SimCovariateListOrNULL", c("SimCovariateList", "NULL"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' `Simulation` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'
