                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for defining Simulation study details. Objects of class

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' `Simulation` should not be created directly but by the constructor

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' `create_simulation_obj()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot data_matrix_list `SimDataList`. The list of lists of data matrices created

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' with `sim_data_list()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot outcome `SimOutcomeList`. List of `Outcome` objects created with

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' `sim_outcome_list()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot borrowing `SimBorrowingList`. List of `Borrowing` objects created

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' with `sim_borrowing_list()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot covariate `SimCovariateList` or `NULL`. List of `Covariate` objects created

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' with `sim_covariate_list()` or `NULL` (no covariate adjustment).

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot treatment `SimTreatmentList`. List of `Treatment` objects created

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' with `sim_treatment_list()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot guide data.frame. Data.frame containing information on all

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' combinations evaluated.

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot n_combos integer. Number of combinations of parameters to be evaluated.

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot n_analyses integer. Number of analyses (combos x datasets to be performed).

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot `analysis_obj_list` list. List of analysis objects indexed according to `guide`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#' @include sim_data_list.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' @include sim_covariate_list.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' @include sim_borrowing_list.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#' @include sim_outcome_list.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#' @include sim_treatment_list.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
.simulation_obj <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
  "Simulation",

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
    data_matrix_list = "SimDataList",

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
    outcome = "SimOutcomeList",

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
    borrowing = "SimBorrowingList",

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
    covariate = "SimCovariateListOrNULL",

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
    treatment = "SimTreatmentList",

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
    guide = "data.frame",

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
    n_combos = "integer",

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
    n_analyses = "integer",

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
    analysis_obj_list = "list"

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
  prototype = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
    n_combos = 0L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
    n_analyses = 0L

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "Simulation",

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    !
                    
                      
    if (object@n_combos > 20 | object@n_analyses > 100) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    !
                    
                      
      cat(

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    !
                    
                      
        "Simulation object with ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    !
                    
                      
        object@n_combos,

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    !
                    
                      
        " combinations and ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    !
                    
                      
        object@n_analyses,

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    !
                    
                      
        " analyses ready to sample. ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    !
                    
                      
        "This is a lot of combinations/analyses! Consider breaking the ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    !
                    
                      
        "study into different simulation objects. Or if you ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    !
                    
                      
        "prefer to use these combinations, call `mcmc_sample()` next."

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    !
                    
                      
      cat(

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    !
                    
                      
        "Simulation object with ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    !
                    
                      
        object@n_combos,

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    !
                    
                      
        " combinations and ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    !
                    
                      
        object@n_analyses,

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    !
                    
                      
        " analyses ready to sample. ",

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    !
                    
                      
        "Next, call `mcmc_sample()`!"

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
# get_vars ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname get_vars

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
#' @include generics.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
  f = "get_vars",

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "Simulation",

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    1x
                    
                      
    cov_cols <- get_vars(object@covariate)

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    1x
                    
                      
    ext_cols <- get_vars(object@borrowing)

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    1x
                    
                      
    trt_cols <- get_vars(object@treatment)

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    1x
                    
                      
    out_cols <- get_vars(object@outcome)

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    1x
                    
                      
    c(cov_cols, ext_cols, trt_cols, out_cols)

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
# show_guide ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname show_guide

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show_guide",

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "Simulation",

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    !
                    
                      
    print(object@guide)

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' `HalfCauchyPrior` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for defining half cauchy priors to be translated to Stan code.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Objects of class `HalfCauchyPrior` should not be created directly but by

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' the constructor [half_cauchy_prior()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot stan_code character. Stan implementation of the prior, with

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' placeholders for the half cauchy stan function parameters surrounded with

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' `{{` and `}}` to be replaced with [glue::glue()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot n_param integer. Number of prior parameters (2).

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot constraint character. Support of prior distribution. In a half cauchy

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' prior, constraint is `mu`

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot mu numeric. Location.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot sigma numeric. Scale (>0).

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @include prior_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @family prior classes

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
.half_cauchy_prior <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
  "HalfCauchyPrior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
  contains = "Prior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
    mu = "numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
    sigma = "numeric"

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  prototype = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
    n_param = 2L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
    stan_code = "cauchy({{object@mu}}, {{object@sigma}})",

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
    constraint = "<lower={{object@mu}}>"

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
  validity = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
    if (object@sigma <= 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
      return("sigma must be >0")

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
    return(TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' Prior half-cauchy distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' @param mu numeric. Location.

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @param sigma numeric. Scale (>0).

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' Stan reference <https://mc-stan.org/docs/functions-reference/cauchy-distribution.html>

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Object of class [`HalfCauchyPrior`][HalfCauchyPrior-class].

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @family priors

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' hcp <- half_cauchy_prior(1, 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
half_cauchy_prior <- function(mu, sigma) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    10x
                    
                      
  .half_cauchy_prior(mu = mu, sigma = sigma)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "HalfCauchyPrior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    1x
                    
                      
    cat("Half Cauchy Distribution\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    1x
                    
                      
    cat("Parameters:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    1x
                    
                      
    print.data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    1x
                    
                      
      data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    1x
                    
                      
        Stan = c("mu", "sigma"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    1x
                    
                      
        R = c("location", "scale"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    1x
                    
                      
        Value = c(object@mu, object@sigma)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
      ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    1x
                    
                      
      row.names = FALSE, right = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    1x
                    
                      
    print(h_glue("Constraints: {{eval_constraints(object)}}"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
# plot ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' plot(half_cauchy_prior(0, 1), xlim = c(-20, 20))

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#' plot(half_cauchy_prior(0, 2), xlim = c(-20, 20), col = 2, add = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
  f = "plot",

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  signature = c("HalfCauchyPrior", "missing"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(x, y, add = FALSE, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    1x
                    
                      
    limits <- stats::qcauchy(c(0.5, 0.995), location = x@mu, scale = x@sigma)

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    1x
                    
                      
    density_fun <- function(values) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    1x
                    
                      
      ifelse(

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    1x
                    
                      
        values < x@mu,

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    1x
                    
                      
        0,

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    1x
                    
                      
        stats::dcauchy(values, location = x@mu, scale = x@sigma)

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
      )

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    1x
                    
                      
    dist_type <- "continuous"

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    1x
                    
                      
    callNextMethod(default_limits = limits, density_fun = density_fun, dist_type = dist_type, add = add, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Create Data Matrix

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Creates a matrix suitable for [create_analysis_obj()]. Creates dummy variables for factors and

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' allows transformations of covariates specified with a formula.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param data data.frame. Data containing all variables

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param outcome character. The outcome variable for binary outcomes or the time and censoring variables.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @param trt_flag_col character. The treatment indicator variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param ext_flag_col character. The external cohort indicator.

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @param covariates character or formula. The covariates for model adjustment.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param weight_var character. An optional weight variable.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @return  Invisibly returns a `matrix` containing all variables to pass to [create_analysis_obj()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'  Prints names of covariates columns to use with [add_covariates()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' dat <- survival::diabetic

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' dat$ext <- dat$trt == 0 & dat$id > 1000

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' data_mat <- create_data_matrix(

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'   dat,

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   outcome = c("time", "status"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   trt_flag_col = "trt",

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   ext_flag_col = "ext",

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   covariates = ~ age + laser + log(risk)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#' data_mat

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
create_data_matrix <- function(data, outcome, trt_flag_col, ext_flag_col, covariates = NULL, weight_var = NULL) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    17x
                    
                      
  assert_data_frame(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    15x
                    
                      
  data_cols <- colnames(data)

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    15x
                    
                      
  assert_character(outcome, min.len = 1, max.len = 2, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    13x
                    
                      
  assert_subset(outcome, data_cols)

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    12x
                    
                      
  assert_character(trt_flag_col, len = 1, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    12x
                    
                      
  assert_subset(trt_flag_col, data_cols)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    11x
                    
                      
  assert_character(ext_flag_col, len = 1, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    11x
                    
                      
  assert_subset(ext_flag_col, data_cols)

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    10x
                    
                      
  assert_character(weight_var, len = 1, any.missing = FALSE, null.ok = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    10x
                    
                      
  assert_subset(weight_var, data_cols)

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    10x
                    
                      
  flag_outcome_formula <- formula(paste("~", paste(c(outcome, trt_flag_col, ext_flag_col, weight_var), collapse = "+")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    10x
                    
                      
  output_matrix <- model.matrix(flag_outcome_formula, data)[, -1]

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    10x
                    
                      
  if (!is.null(covariates)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    9x
                    
                      
    assert_multi_class(covariates, c("character", "formula"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    8x
                    
                      
    if (test_formula(covariates)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    5x
                    
                      
      assert_subset(all.vars(covariates), data_cols)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    3x
                    
                      
    } else if (is.character(covariates)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    3x
                    
                      
      assert_subset(covariates, data_cols)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    1x
                    
                      
      covariates <- formula(paste("~", paste(covariates, collapse = "+")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    5x
                    
                      
    covariates_matrix <- model.matrix(covariates, data)[, -1, drop = FALSE]

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    5x
                    
                      
    matrix_cov_cols <- deparse(colnames(covariates_matrix))

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    5x
                    
                      
    cat("Call `add_covariates()` with `covariates = ", matrix_cov_cols, "`\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    5x
                    
                      
    output_matrix <- cbind(output_matrix, covariates_matrix)

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    6x
                    
                      
  invisible(output_matrix)

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' What is the MSE for a given model

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @param draws draws_array Object of class `draws` from

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' `CmdStanMCMC$draws()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param true_effect numeric. The true treatment effect.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @return the mean squared error (MSE) of the sample

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' MSE will be calculated as (true_effect - median_estimated_effect) ^ 2

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' base_mat <- matrix(

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(0, 200), rep(0, 200), rep(1, 200),

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(1, 200), rep(0, 200), rep(0, 200),

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(0, 600)

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'   ncol = 3,

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'   dimnames = list(NULL, c("ext", "trt", "driftOR"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#' add_binary_endpoint <- function(odds_ratio,

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'                                 base_matrix = base_mat) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   linear_predictor <- base_matrix[, "trt"] * log(odds_ratio)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   prob <- 1 / (1 + exp(-linear_predictor))

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'   bin_endpoint <- rbinom(

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'     NROW(base_matrix),

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'     1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'     prob

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'   cbind(base_matrix, matrix(bin_endpoint, ncol = 1, dimnames = list(NULL, "ep")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' data_list <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'   list(add_binary_endpoint(1.5), add_binary_endpoint(1.5)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'   list(add_binary_endpoint(2.5), add_binary_endpoint(2.5))

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' guide <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'   trueOR = c(1.5, 2.5),

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'   driftOR = c(1.0, 1.0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'   index = 1:2

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' sdl <- sim_data_list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_list = data_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'   guide = guide,

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'   effect = "trueOR",

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'   drift = "driftOR",

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'   index = "index"

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' x <- create_simulation_obj(

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_matrix_list = sdl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#'   outcome = logistic_bin_outcome("ep", normal_prior(0, 1000)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#'   borrowing = sim_borrowing_list(list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#'     full_borrowing = borrowing_details("Full borrowing", "ext"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#'     bdb = borrowing_details("BDB", "ext", exponential_prior(0.0001))

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#'   )),

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#'   treatment = treatment_details("trt", normal_prior(0, 1000))

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#' i <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#' j <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' true_effect <- x@guide[i, x@data_matrix_list@effect]

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#' anls_obj <- x@analysis_obj_list[[i]][[j]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' res <- mcmc_sample(anls_obj, iter_sampling = 500)

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' draws <- res$draws()

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#' psborrow2:::sim_estimate_mse(

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#'   draws,

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#'   true_effect

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
sim_estimate_mse <- function(draws,

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
                             true_effect) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    !
                    
                      
  effect_index <- dimnames(draws)$variable %in% c("HR_trt", "OR_trt")

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    !
                    
                      
  mse <- mean((draws[, , effect_index] - true_effect)^2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    !
                    
                      
  return(mse)

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' `UniformPrior` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for defining uniform priors to be translated to Stan code.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Objects of class `UniformPrior` should not be created directly but by

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' the constructor [uniform_prior()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot stan_code character. Stan implementation of the prior, with

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' placeholders for uniform stan function parameters surrounded with

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' `{{` and `}}` to be replaced with [glue::glue()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot n_param integer. Number of prior parameters (2).

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot constraint character. Support of prior distribution,

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' `"<lower=`alpha`, upper=`beta`>"`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot alpha numeric. Lower bound.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot beta numeric. Upper bound (>`alpha`).

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @include prior_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @family prior classes

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
.uniform_prior <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
  "UniformPrior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
  contains = "Prior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
    alpha = "numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
    beta = "numeric"

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  prototype = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
    n_param = 2L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
    stan_code = "uniform({{object@alpha}}, {{object@beta}})",

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
    constraint = "<lower={{object@alpha}},upper={{object@beta}}>"

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
  validity = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
    if (object@beta <= object@alpha) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
      return("beta must be > alpha")

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
    return(TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' Prior uniform distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' @param alpha numeric. Lower bound.

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @param beta numeric. Upper bound (>`alpha`).

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' Stan reference <https://mc-stan.org/docs/functions-reference/uniform-distribution.html>

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Object of class [`UniformPrior`][UniformPrior-class].

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @family priors

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' up <- uniform_prior(0, 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
uniform_prior <- function(alpha, beta) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    11x
                    
                      
  .uniform_prior(alpha = alpha, beta = beta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "UniformPrior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    1x
                    
                      
    cat("Uniform Distribution\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    1x
                    
                      
    cat("Parameters:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    1x
                    
                      
    print.data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    1x
                    
                      
      data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    1x
                    
                      
        Stan = c("alpha", "beta"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    1x
                    
                      
        R = c("min", "max"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    1x
                    
                      
        Value = c(object@alpha, object@beta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
      ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    1x
                    
                      
      row.names = FALSE, right = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    1x
                    
                      
    print(h_glue("Constraints: {{eval_constraints(object)}}"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
# plot ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#' plot(uniform_prior(1, 2), xlim = c(0, 3))

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
  f = "plot",

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  signature = c("UniformPrior", "missing"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(x, y, add = FALSE, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    1x
                    
                      
    limits <- c(x@alpha, x@beta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    1x
                    
                      
    density_fun <- function(values) stats::dunif(values, min = x@alpha, max = x@beta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    1x
                    
                      
    dist_type <- "continuous"

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    1x
                    
                      
    callNextMethod(default_limits = limits, density_fun = density_fun, dist_type = dist_type, add = add, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' `CauchyPrior` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for defining the cauchy priors to be translated to Stan code.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Objects of class `CauchyPrior` should not be created directly but by

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' the constructor [cauchy_prior()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot stan_code character. Stan implementation of the prior, with

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' placeholders for cauchy stan function parameters surrounded with

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' `{{` and `}}` to be replaced with [glue::glue()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot n_param integer. Number of prior parameters (2).

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot constraint character. Support of prior distribution,

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' (all values allowed in cauchy distribution).

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot mu numeric. Location.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot sigma numeric. Scale (>0).

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
