#' @include prior_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @family prior classes

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
.cauchy_prior <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
  "CauchyPrior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
  contains = "Prior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
    mu = "numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
    sigma = "numeric"

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  prototype = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
    n_param = 2L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
    stan_code = "cauchy({{object@mu}}, {{object@sigma}})",

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
    constraint = ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
  validity = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
    if (object@sigma <= 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
      return("sigma must be >0")

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
    return(TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' Prior cauchy distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' @param mu numeric. Location.

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @param sigma numeric. Scale (>0).

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' Stan reference <https://mc-stan.org/docs/functions-reference/cauchy-distribution.html>

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Object of class [`CauchyPrior`][CauchyPrior-class].

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @family priors

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' cp <- cauchy_prior(1, 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
cauchy_prior <- function(mu, sigma) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    5x
                    
                      
  .cauchy_prior(mu = mu, sigma = sigma)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "CauchyPrior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    1x
                    
                      
    cat("Cauchy Distribution\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    1x
                    
                      
    cat("Parameters:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    1x
                    
                      
    print.data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    1x
                    
                      
      data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    1x
                    
                      
        Stan = c("mu", "sigma"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    1x
                    
                      
        R = c("location", "scale"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    1x
                    
                      
        Value = c(object@mu, object@sigma)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
      ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    1x
                    
                      
      row.names = FALSE, right = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    !
                    
                      
    if (object@constraint != "") print(h_glue("Constraints: {{object@constraint}}"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
# plot ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' plot(cauchy_prior(0, 1), xlim = c(-20, 20))

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#' plot(cauchy_prior(0, 2), xlim = c(-20, 20), col = 2, add = TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
  f = "plot",

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  signature = c("CauchyPrior", "missing"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(x, y, add = FALSE, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    1x
                    
                      
    limits <- stats::qcauchy(c(0.005, 0.995), location = x@mu, scale = x@sigma)

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    1x
                    
                      
    density_fun <- function(values) stats::dcauchy(values, location = x@mu, scale = x@sigma)

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    1x
                    
                      
    dist_type <- "continuous"

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    1x
                    
                      
    callNextMethod(default_limits = limits, density_fun = density_fun, dist_type = dist_type, add = add, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' `Outcome` class

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#' @family outcome

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
  "Outcome",

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
  contains = "VIRTUAL"

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' `TimeToEvent` class

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot function_stan_code character. Code to include in the Stan functions program block.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot param_stan_code character. Code to include in the Stan parameters program block.

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot likelihood_stan_code character. Code defining the likelihood to include in the Stan model program block.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot data_stan_code character. Code to include in the Stan data program block.

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot n_param integer. Number of ancillary parameters for the model to estimate.

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot param_priors list. Named list of prior distributions on the ancillary parameters in the model.

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot time_var character. Variable used for time in `TimeToEvent` objects.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot cens_var character. Variable used for censoring in `TimeToEvent` objects.

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot baseline_prior `Prior`. Object of class `Prior`

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' specifying prior distribution for the baseline outcome.

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @family outcome

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
  "TimeToEvent",

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
    function_stan_code = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
    param_stan_code = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
    likelihood_stan_code = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
    data_stan_code = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
    n_param = "integer",

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
    param_priors = "list",

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
    time_var = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
    cens_var = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
    weight_var = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
    baseline_prior = "Prior"

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
  prototype = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
    n_param = 0L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
    function_stan_code = "",

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
    param_stan_code = "",

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
    likelihood_stan_code = "",

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
    weight_var = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
    data_stan_code = "vector[N] time;

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
    vector[N] cens;",

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
    baseline_prior = NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
  contains = "Outcome"

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' `BinaryOutcome` class

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot function_stan_code character. Code to include in the Stan functions program block.

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot param_stan_code character. Code to include in the Stan parameters program block.

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot likelihood_stan_code character. Code defining the likelihood to include in the Stan model program block.

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot data_stan_code character. Code to include in the Stan data program block.

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot n_param integer. Number of ancillary parameters for the model to estimate.

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot param_priors list. Named list of prior distributions on the ancillary parameters in the model.

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot binary_var character. Variable used for outcome in `BinaryOutcome` objects.

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot baseline_prior `Prior`. Object of class `Prior`

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' specifying prior distribution for the baseline outcome.

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#' @family outcome

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
  "BinaryOutcome",

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
    function_stan_code = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
    param_stan_code = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
    likelihood_stan_code = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
    data_stan_code = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
    n_param = "integer",

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
    param_priors = "list",

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
    binary_var = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
    weight_var = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
    baseline_prior = "Prior"

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
  prototype = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
    n_param = 0L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
    function_stan_code = "",

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
    param_stan_code = "",

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
    likelihood_stan_code = "",

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
    weight_var = "",

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
    data_stan_code = "array[N] int y;",

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
    baseline_prior = NULL

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
  contains = "Outcome"

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "Outcome",

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("Outcome object with class", class(object)[1], "\n\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("Outcome variables:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    !
                    
                      
    print(get_vars(object))

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("Baseline prior:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    !
                    
                      
    show(object@baseline_prior)

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    !
                    
                      
    if (!is.null(object@param_priors)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    !
                    
                      
      cat("\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    !
                    
                      
      for (i in names(object@param_priors)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    !
                    
                      
        cat(i, "prior:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    !
                    
                      
        show(object@param_priors[[i]])

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
      }

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    106
                    
                    
                      
# get_vars ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    107
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname get_vars

                    		
                  

                  

                    108
                    
                    
                      
#' @include generics.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    109
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    110
                    
                    
                      
  f = "get_vars",

                    		
                  

                  

                    111
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "TimeToEvent",

                    		
                  

                  

                    112
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    113
                    43x
                    
                      
    weight_var <- if (object@weight_var != "") object@weight_var

                    		
                  

                  

                    114
                    43x
                    
                      
    c(time_var = object@time_var, cens_var = object@cens_var, weight_var = weight_var)

                    		
                  

                  

                    115
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    116

#' @rdname get_vars

#' @include generics.R

setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    121
                    
                    
                      
  f = "get_vars",

                    		
                  

                  

                    122
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "BinaryOutcome",

                    		
                  

                  

                    123
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    124
                    5x

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Add Covariates for Model Adjustment

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Specify column names for adjustment variables in model matrix and prior

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' distributions for the model parameters for these covariates (i.e., betas)

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param covariates character. Names of columns in the data matrix containing

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' covariates to be adjusted for in the outcome model. Note: the

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' external and treatment flags should not go here.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @param priors Either a single object of class `Prior` specifying the prior

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' distribution to apply to all covariates or a named list of

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' distributions of class `Prior`, one for each covariate

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Object of class [`Covariates`][Covariates-class].

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @include covariate_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' add_covariates(

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'   covariates = c("a", "b"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'   priors = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'     "a" = normal_prior(0, 1),

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'     "b" = normal_prior(0, 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
add_covariates <- function(covariates,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
                           priors) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    46x
                    
                      
  if (!is(priors, "listOrPrior")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    1x
                    
                      
    stop(

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    1x
                    
                      
      "priors argument must be a single object of class `Prior`",

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    1x
                    
                      
      " or a named list of objects of class `Prior`"

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    45x
                    
                      
  assert_character(covariates)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    44x
                    
                      
  .covariate_class(

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    44x
                    
                      
    covariates = covariates,

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    44x
                    
                      
    priors = priors

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Check Stan

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @description Check whether `cmdstanr` is available and prints version and logistic example.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' @param check_sampling Compile and sample from the "logistic" example model.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' check_cmdstanr()

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
check_cmdstanr <- function(check_sampling = FALSE) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    1x
                    
                      
  cat("cmdstan version: \n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    1x
                    
                      
  print(cmdstan_version())

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    1x
                    
                      
  cat("Example program:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    1x
                    
                      
  print_example_program(example = c("logistic"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    1x
                    
                      
  if (check_sampling) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("Example program results:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    !
                    
                      
    cmdstanr_example("logistic", quiet = FALSE, chains = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' `Prior` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for defining priors to be translated to Stan code. Objects of class

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' `Prior` should not be created directly but by one of the specific prior

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' class constructors.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot stan_code character. Stan implementation of the prior, with

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' placeholders for parameters surrounded with `{{` and `}}` to be replaced

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' with [glue::glue()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot n_param integer. Number of prior parameters.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot constraint character. Support of prior distribution expressed as a

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' Stan constraint, e.g. `"<lower=0, upper=1>"`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @family prior classes

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @seealso Prior constructor functions: [bernoulli_prior()], [beta_prior()], [cauchy_prior()], [gamma_prior()],

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'  [normal_prior()], [poisson_prior()], [uniform_prior()]

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
  "Prior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
    stan_code = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
    n_param = "integer",

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
    constraint = "character"

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
  validity = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
    check_string(object@stan_code)

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
    check_integer(object@n_param, lower = 1, len = 1, any.missing = FALSE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
    check_string(object@constraint)

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
  },

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
  contains = "VIRTUAL"

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "Prior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    !
                    
                      
    cat(

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    !
                    
                      
      class(object)[1],

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    !
                    
                      
      "object with parameters",

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    !
                    
                      
      h_glue(object@stan_code)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
# plot ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @param default_limits Numeric range to plot distribution over.

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @param dist_type Plot a continuous or discrete distribution.

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' @param density_fun Function which takes a vector of values and returns a vector of density values.

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
  f = "plot",

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
  signature = c("Prior", "missing"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(x, y, default_limits, dist_type = c("continuous", "discrete"), density_fun, add, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    10x
                    
                      
    assert_numeric(default_limits, finite = TRUE, any.missing = FALSE, len = 2)

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    10x
                    
                      
    dist_type <- match.arg(dist_type)

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    10x
                    
                      
    assert_function(density_fun)

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    10x
                    
                      
    assert_flag(add)

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    10x
                    
                      
    limits <- if (!is.na(xlim_arg_n <- match("xlim", ...names()))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    !
                    
                      
      ...elt(xlim_arg_n)

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    10x
                    
                      
    } else if (isTRUE(add)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    !
                    
                      
      par("usr")[1L:2L]

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    10x
                    
                      
      default_limits

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    10x
                    
                      
    values <- if (dist_type == "discrete") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    2x
                    
                      
      seq(from = ceiling(limits[1]), to = floor(limits[2]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    8x
                    
                      
      n <- if (!is.na(n_arg_n <- match("n", ...names()))) ...elt(n_arg_n) else 301

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    8x
                    
                      
      seq(from = limits[1], to = limits[2], length = n)

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    10x
                    
                      
    y <- density_fun(values)

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    10x
                    
                      
    if (dist_type == "continuous") {

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    !
                    
                      
      if (isTRUE(add)) lines(values, y, ...) else plot_pdf(values, y, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
    } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    2x
                    
                      
      plot_pmf(values, y, add = add, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
# evaluate constraints----

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
#' Evaluate constraints

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
#' Evaluate constraints when these are called

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    
                    
                      
#' @param object `Prior` object

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname eval_constraints

                    		
                  

                  

                    93
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    94
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    95
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    96
                    118x
                    
                      
setGeneric("eval_constraints", function(object) standardGeneric("eval_constraints"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    97
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    98
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname eval_constraints

                    		
                  

                  

                    99
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    100
                    
                    
                      
  f = "eval_constraints",

                    		
                  

                  

                    101
                    
                    
                      
  signature = c("Prior"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    102
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    103
                    118x
                    
                      
    return(h_glue(object@constraint))

                    		
                  

                  

                    104
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    105
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Do the posterior quantiles contain the true treatment effect?

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @param draws draws_array Object of class `draws` from

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' `CmdStanMCMC$draws()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param true_effect numeric. The true treatment effect.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' @param posterior_quantiles numeric. Vector of length two specifying

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' quantiles of the posterior treatment effect distribution in which

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' to search for the true effect.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @return 1L if the effect is contained within the quantiles, else 0L

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' base_mat <- matrix(

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(0, 200), rep(0, 200), rep(1, 200),

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(1, 200), rep(0, 200), rep(0, 200),

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(0, 600)

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   ncol = 3,

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'   dimnames = list(NULL, c("ext", "trt", "driftOR"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#' add_binary_endpoint <- function(odds_ratio,

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'                                 base_matrix = base_mat) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   linear_predictor <- base_matrix[, "trt"] * log(odds_ratio)

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'   prob <- 1 / (1 + exp(-linear_predictor))

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'   bin_endpoint <- rbinom(

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'     NROW(base_matrix),

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'     1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'     prob

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#'   cbind(base_matrix, matrix(bin_endpoint, ncol = 1, dimnames = list(NULL, "ep")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#' data_list <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'   list(add_binary_endpoint(1.5), add_binary_endpoint(1.5)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'   list(add_binary_endpoint(2.5), add_binary_endpoint(2.5))

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' guide <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'   trueOR = c(1.5, 2.5),

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'   driftOR = c(1.0, 1.0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'   index = 1:2

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' sdl <- sim_data_list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_list = data_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'   guide = guide,

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'   effect = "trueOR",

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'   drift = "driftOR",

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'   index = "index"

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#' x <- create_simulation_obj(

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_matrix_list = sdl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'   outcome = logistic_bin_outcome("ep", normal_prior(0, 1000)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#'   borrowing = sim_borrowing_list(list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#'     full_borrowing = borrowing_details("Full borrowing", "ext"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#'     bdb = borrowing_details("BDB", "ext", exponential_prior(0.0001))

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#'   )),

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#'   treatment = treatment_details("trt", normal_prior(0, 1000))

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#' i <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#' j <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' true_effect <- x@guide[i, x@data_matrix_list@effect]

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#' anls_obj <- x@analysis_obj_list[[i]][[j]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' res <- mcmc_sample(anls_obj, iter_sampling = 500)

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' draws <- res$draws()

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#' psborrow2:::sim_is_true_effect_covered(

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#'   draws,

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#'   true_effect,

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#'   c(0.025, 0.975)

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
sim_is_true_effect_covered <- function(draws,

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
                                       true_effect,

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
