                                       posterior_quantiles) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    !
                    
                      
  summ_draws <- posterior::summarise_draws(draws, ~ quantile(.x, probs = posterior_quantiles))

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    !
                    
                      
  effect_range <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    !
                    
                      
    summ_draws[summ_draws$variable %in% c("HR_trt", "OR_trt"), 2][[1]],

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    !
                    
                      
    summ_draws[summ_draws$variable %in% c("HR_trt", "OR_trt"), 3][[1]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    !
                    
                      
  return(as.integer(true_effect >= effect_range[1] & true_effect <= effect_range[2]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' `BernoulliPrior` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for defining bernoulli priors to be translated to Stan code.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Objects of class `BernoulliPrior` should not be created directly but by

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' the constructor [bernoulli_prior()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot stan_code character. Stan implementation of the prior, with

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' placeholders for bernoulli stan function parameters surrounded with

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' `{{` and `}}` to be replaced with [glue::glue()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot n_param integer. Number of prior parameters (1).

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot constraint character. Support of prior distribution,

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' `"<lower=0, upper=1>"`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot theta numeric. Probability (in \[0, 1\]).

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @include prior_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @family prior classes

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
.bernoulli_prior <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
  "BernoulliPrior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
  contains = "Prior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(theta = "numeric"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
  prototype = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
    n_param = 1L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
    stan_code = "bernoulli({{object@theta}})",

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
    constraint = "<lower=0, upper=1>"

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
  validity = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
    if (object@theta < 0 || object@theta > 1) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
      return("theta must be within [0,1]")

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
    return(TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' Prior bernoulli distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' @param theta numeric. Probability (in \[0, 1\]).

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' Stan reference <https://mc-stan.org/docs/functions-reference/bernoulli-distribution.html>

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Object of class [`BernoulliPrior`][BernoulliPrior-class].

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @family priors

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' bp <- bernoulli_prior(0.23)

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
bernoulli_prior <- function(theta) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    5x
                    
                      
  .bernoulli_prior(theta = theta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "BernoulliPrior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    1x
                    
                      
    cat("Bernoulli Distribution\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    1x
                    
                      
    cat("Parameters:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    1x
                    
                      
    print.data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    1x
                    
                      
      data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    1x
                    
                      
        Stan = "theta",

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    1x
                    
                      
        R = "prob",

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    1x
                    
                      
        Value = object@theta

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
      ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    1x
                    
                      
      row.names = FALSE, right = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (object@constraint != "") print(h_glue("Constraints: {{object@constraint}}"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
# plot ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#' plot(bernoulli_prior(0.4), xlim = c(0, 15))

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
  f = "plot",

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
  signature = c("BernoulliPrior", "missing"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(x, y, add = FALSE, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    1x
                    
                      
    limits <- c(0, 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    1x
                    
                      
    density_fun <- function(values) stats::dbinom(values, prob = x@theta, size = 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    1x
                    
                      
    dist_type <- "discrete"

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    1x
                    
                      
    callNextMethod(default_limits = limits, density_fun = density_fun, dist_type = dist_type, add = add, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Make model string of Stan's parameters model block

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Create the Stan string encompassed by parameters `{}`

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param analysis_obj `Analysis`. Object of class [`Analysis`][Analysis-class] created by

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' `psborrow2:::.analysis_obj()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @return `glue` `character` containing the Stan code for the functions block.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' anls_obj <- psborrow2:::.analysis_obj(

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_matrix = example_matrix,

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   outcome = exp_surv_dist("time", "cnsr", normal_prior(0, 100)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   borrowing = borrowing_details(

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Full borrowing",

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'     "ext"

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   treatment = treatment_details("trt", normal_prior(0, 100))

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' psborrow2:::make_model_string_parameters(anls_obj)

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
make_model_string_parameters <- function(analysis_obj) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  ## Parameters string

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    19x
                    
                      
  trt_string <- h_glue("real{{eval_constraints(analysis_obj@treatment@trt_prior)}} beta_trt;")

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    19x
                    
                      
  is_bdb <- isTRUE(analysis_obj@borrowing@method == "BDB")

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
  ### Set tau

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    19x
                    
                      
  borrowing_string <- if (is_bdb) h_glue("real{{eval_constraints(analysis_obj@borrowing@tau_prior)}} tau;") else ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
  ### Set alpha

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    19x
                    
                      
  intercept_string <- h_glue(

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    19x
                    
                      
    "{{type}}{{constraint}}{{n}} alpha;",

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    19x
                    
                      
    type = if (is_bdb) "vector" else "real",

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    19x
                    
                      
    constraint = eval_constraints(analysis_obj@outcome@baseline_prior),

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    19x
                    
                      
    n = if (is_bdb) "[2]" else ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
  ### Add outcome specific parameters

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    19x
                    
                      
  if (NROW(analysis_obj@outcome@param_priors) > 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    1x
                    
                      
    constraints <- lapply(analysis_obj@outcome@param_priors, function(p) eval_constraints(p))

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    1x
                    
                      
    outcome_string <- h_glue("real{{constraints}} {{names(constraints)}};")

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    18x
                    
                      
    outcome_string <- analysis_obj@outcome@param_stan_code

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
  ### Add in vector of coefficients if covariates are provided

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    19x
                    
                      
  covariate_string <- if (!is.null(analysis_obj@covariates)) "vector<lower=L_beta, upper=U_beta>[K] beta;" else ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    19x
                    
                      
  h_glue("parameters {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    19x
                    
                      
  {{trt_string}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    19x
                    
                      
  {{outcome_string}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    19x
                    
                      
  {{borrowing_string}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    19x
                    
                      
  {{intercept_string}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    19x
                    
                      
  {{covariate_string}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
  }")

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Specify Treatment Details

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Specify the treatment arm column name in the model matrix and set a prior

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' distribution for the treatment effect (log hazard ratio or

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' log odds ratio)

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @param trt_flag_col character. The name of the column

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' in the model matrix that corresponds to the treatment flag

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' (`1`/`0` or `TRUE`/`FALSE`). This identifies patients as belonging

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' to the experimental treatment arm.

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @param trt_prior Object of class `Prior` specifying the

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' prior distribution of the log effect estimate (log hazard ratio for

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' time to event endpoints and log odds ratio for binary endpoints).

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Object of class [`Treatment`][Treatment-class].

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' @include treatment_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' sta <- treatment_details(

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'   trt_flag_col = "trt",

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   trt_prior = normal_prior(0, 1000)

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
treatment_details <- function(trt_flag_col,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
                              trt_prior) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
  # Additional checks and neater errors that in class definition

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    69x
                    
                      
  assert_string(trt_flag_col)

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    68x
                    
                      
  assert_class(trt_prior, "Prior")

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    67x
                    
                      
  .treatment_class(

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    67x
                    
                      
    trt_flag_col = trt_flag_col,

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    67x
                    
                      
    trt_prior = trt_prior

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Make model string of Stan's transformed parameters model block

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Create the Stan string encompassed by transformed parameters `{}`

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param analysis_obj `Analysis`. Object of class [`Analysis`][Analysis-class] created by

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' `psborrow2:::.analysis_obj()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @return `glue` `character` containing the Stan code for the functions block.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' anls_obj <- psborrow2:::.analysis_obj(

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_matrix = example_matrix,

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   outcome = exp_surv_dist("time", "cnsr", normal_prior(0, 100)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   borrowing = borrowing_details(

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Full borrowing",

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'     "ext"

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   treatment = treatment_details("trt", normal_prior(0, 100))

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' psborrow2:::make_model_string_transf_param(anls_obj)

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
make_model_string_transf_param <- function(analysis_obj) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    19x
                    
                      
  transformed_parameters_string <- if (is(analysis_obj@outcome, "TimeToEvent")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    18x
                    
                      
    "real HR_trt = exp(beta_trt);"

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    19x
                    
                      
  } else if (is(analysis_obj@outcome, "BinaryOutcome")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    1x
                    
                      
    "real OR_trt = exp(beta_trt);"

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
  } else {

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
    ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    19x
                    
                      
  h_glue("transformed parameters {

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    19x
                    
                      
    {{transformed_parameters_string}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  }")

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' `SimOutcomeList` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for outcome details as part of a simulation study.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Objects of class `SimOutcomeList` should not be created

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' directly but by the constructor `sim_outcome_list()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot outcome_list named list of object of class `Outcome`, one object

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' for each parameter variation.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @include outcome_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @include exp_surv_dist.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' @include weib_ph_surv_dist.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @include logistic_bin_outcome.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
.sim_outcome_list <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
  "SimOutcomeList",

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
    outcome_list = "list",

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
    guide = "data.frame"

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
  validity = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
    if (!all(vapply(object@outcome_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
      function(item) is(item, "Outcome"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
      FUN.VALUE = logical(1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
    ))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
      return("`outcome_list` must be a list of `Outcome` objects.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
    if (is.null(names(object@outcome_list))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
      return("`outcome_list` must be named.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
    if (any(names(object@outcome_list) == "")) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
      return("All items in `outcome_list` must be named.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
    if (length(unique(names(object@outcome_list))) != length(names(object@outcome_list))) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
      return("All names supplied to `outcome_list` must be unique.")

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' Input outcome details for a simulation study

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#' A function for defining which outcome scenarios should be evaluated as

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' part of a simulation study.

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' @param outcome_list named list of objects of class `Outcome` created

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' by `outcome_details()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @family simulation classes

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#' outcome_scenarios <- sim_outcome_list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#'   list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Exponential" = exp_surv_dist("time", "cnsr", normal_prior(0, 10000))

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
sim_outcome_list <- function(outcome_list) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    10x
                    
                      
  outcome <- .sim_outcome_list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    10x
                    
                      
    outcome_list = outcome_list

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    5x
                    
                      
  outcome@guide <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    5x
                    
                      
    outcome_scenario = names(outcome@outcome_list)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    5x
                    
                      
  outcome

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "SimOutcomeList",

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("SimOutcomeList object with ", NROW(object@outcome_list), " different scenario(s)\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    !
                    
                      
    if (NROW(object@outcome_list) <= 10) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    !
                    
                      
      print(object@guide)

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    
                    
                      
# get_vars ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname get_vars

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
#' @include generics.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    87
                    
                    
                      
  f = "get_vars",

                    		
                  

                  

                    88
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "SimOutcomeList",

                    		
                  

                  

                    89
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    90
                    2x
                    
                      
    unique(unlist(lapply(object@outcome_list, get_vars)))

                    		
                  

                  

                    91
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    92
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' `BetaPrior` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for defining beta priors to be translated to Stan code.

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' Objects of class `BetaPrior` should not be created directly but by

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' the constructor [beta_prior()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot stan_code character. Stan implementation of the prior, with

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' placeholders for beta stan function parameters surrounded with

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' `{{` and `}}` to be replaced with [glue::glue()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot n_param integer. Number of prior parameters (2).

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot constraint character. Support of prior distribution,

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' `"<lower=0, upper=1>"`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot alpha numeric. Shape (>=0).

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot beta numeric. Shape (>=0).

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' @include prior_class.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' @family prior classes

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
.beta_prior <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
  "BetaPrior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
  contains = "Prior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
    alpha = "numeric",

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
    beta = "numeric"

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  prototype = list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
    n_param = 2L,

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
    stan_code = "beta({{object@alpha}}, {{object@beta}})",

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
    constraint = "<lower=0, upper=1>"

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
  validity = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
    if (object@alpha < 0 || object@beta < 0) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
      return("Both alpha and beta must be >= 0")

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
    return(TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#' Prior beta distribution

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#' @param alpha numeric. Shape (>=0).

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' @param beta numeric. Shape (>=0).

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#' @details

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#' Stan reference <https://mc-stan.org/docs/functions-reference/beta-distribution.html>

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#' @return Object of class [`BetaPrior`][BetaPrior-class]

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' @export

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#' @family priors

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#' bp <- beta_prior(9, 235)

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
beta_prior <- function(alpha, beta) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    6x
                    
                      
  .beta_prior(alpha = alpha, beta = beta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "BetaPrior",

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    1x
                    
                      
    cat("Beta Distribution\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    1x
                    
                      
    cat("Parameters:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    1x
                    
                      
    print.data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    1x
                    
                      
      data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    1x
                    
                      
        Stan = c("alpha", "beta"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    1x
                    
                      
        R = c("shape1", "shape2"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    1x
                    
                      
        Value = c(object@alpha, object@beta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
      ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    1x
                    
                      
      row.names = FALSE, right = FALSE

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
    )

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    1x
                    
                      
    if (object@constraint != "") print(h_glue("Constraints: {{object@constraint}}"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
# plot ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname plot

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
#' plot(beta_prior(2, 2))

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    
                    
                      
  f = "plot",

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    
                    
                      
  signature = c("BetaPrior", "missing"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(x, y, add = FALSE, ...) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    1x
                    
                      
    limits <- c(0, 1)

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    1x
                    
                      
    density_fun <- function(values) stats::dbeta(values, shape1 = x@alpha, shape2 = x@beta)

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    1x
                    
                      
    dist_type <- "continuous"

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    1x
                    
                      
    callNextMethod(default_limits = limits, density_fun = density_fun, dist_type = dist_type, add = add, ...)

                    		
                  

                  

                    85
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    86
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
# class union ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
setClassUnion("PriorOrNULL", c("Prior", "NULL"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' `Borrowing` Class

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' A class for defining borrowing details. Objects of class

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' `Borrowing` should not be created directly but by the constructor

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' [borrowing_details()].

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot method character. The type of borrowing to perform. It

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' must be one of: `'BDB'`, `'Full borrowing'`, or `'No borrowing'`. See `?borrowing_details` for

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#' more information.

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot ext_flag_col character. The name of the column in

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#' the data matrix that corresponds to the external control flag (`1`/`0` or

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#' `TRUE`/`FALSE`). This identifies a patient as belonging to the external

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#' control cohort.

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot tau_prior `Prior`. Object of class `Prior` defining the hyperprior on the

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#' "commensurability parameter". See `?borrowing_details` for more information.

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' @slot data_stan_code string. Code to include in the Stan data program block.

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
.borrowing_class <- setClass(

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
  "Borrowing",

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
  slots = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
    method = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
    ext_flag_col = "character",

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
    tau_prior = "PriorOrNULL",

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
    data_stan_code = "character"

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
  prototype = c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
    method = "No borrowing",

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
    ext_flag_col = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
    tau_prior = NULL,

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
    data_stan_code = ""

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
  ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
  validity = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
    assert_choice(object@method, c("Full borrowing", "No borrowing", "BDB"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
    if (object@method != "BDB" && !is.null(object@tau_prior)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
      return("no need to specify tau prior when method is not BDB")

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
    assert_string(object@data_stan_code)

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
    return(TRUE)

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
