)

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
# show ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
  f = "show",

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "Borrowing",

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("Borrowing object using", object@method, "\n\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    !
                    
                      
    cat("External control flag:", object@ext_flag_col, "\n\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    !
                    
                      
    if (!is.null(object@tau_prior)) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    !
                    
                      
      cat("Commensurability parameter prior:\n")

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    !
                    
                      
      show(object@tau_prior)

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
    }

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
# get_vars ----

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#' @rdname get_vars

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#' @include generics.R

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
setMethod(

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
  f = "get_vars",

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
  signature = "Borrowing",

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
  definition = function(object) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    58x
                    
                      
    c(ext_flag_col = object@ext_flag_col)

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
  }

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
)

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Make model string of Stan's functions model bloc

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' Create the Stan string encompassed by functions `{}`

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param analysis_obj `Analysis`. Object of class [`Analysis`][Analysis-class] created by

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' `psborrow2:::.analysis_obj()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#' @return `glue` `character` containing the text for the functions block.

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' anls_obj <- psborrow2:::.analysis_obj(

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_matrix = example_matrix,

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'   outcome = exp_surv_dist("time", "cnsr", normal_prior(0, 100)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'   borrowing = borrowing_details(

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'     "Full borrowing",

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'     "ext"

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   treatment = treatment_details("trt", normal_prior(0, 100))

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' psborrow2:::make_model_string_functions(anls_obj)

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
make_model_string_functions <- function(analysis_obj) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
  ## Bring in analysis_obj functions

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    19x
                    
                      
  h_glue("

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    19x
                    
                      
    functions {

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    19x
                    
                      
      {{analysis_obj@outcome@function_stan_code}}

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
    }")

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
}

                    		
                  

                
              

            

            

              

                
                  

                    1
                    
                    
                      
#' Do the posterior quantiles contain a value of 1.0?

                    		
                  

                  

                    2
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    3
                    
                    
                      
#' @param draws draws_array Object of class `draws` from

                    		
                  

                  

                    4
                    
                    
                      
#' `CmdStanMCMC$draws()`.

                    		
                  

                  

                    5
                    
                    
                      
#' @param posterior_quantiles numeric. Vector of length two specifying

                    		
                  

                  

                    6
                    
                    
                      
#' quantiles of the posterior treatment effect distribution in which

                    		
                  

                  

                    7
                    
                    
                      
#' to search for the null effect.

                    		
                  

                  

                    8
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    9
                    
                    
                      
#' @return 1L if the null effect (1.0) is contained within the quantiles, else 0L

                    		
                  

                  

                    10
                    
                    
                      
#' @examples

                    		
                  

                  

                    11
                    
                    
                      
#' base_mat <- matrix(

                    		
                  

                  

                    12
                    
                    
                      
#'   c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    13
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(0, 200), rep(0, 200), rep(1, 200),

                    		
                  

                  

                    14
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(1, 200), rep(0, 200), rep(0, 200),

                    		
                  

                  

                    15
                    
                    
                      
#'     rep(0, 600)

                    		
                  

                  

                    16
                    
                    
                      
#'   ),

                    		
                  

                  

                    17
                    
                    
                      
#'   ncol = 3,

                    		
                  

                  

                    18
                    
                    
                      
#'   dimnames = list(NULL, c("ext", "trt", "driftOR"))

                    		
                  

                  

                    19
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    20
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    21
                    
                    
                      
#' add_binary_endpoint <- function(odds_ratio,

                    		
                  

                  

                    22
                    
                    
                      
#'                                 base_matrix = base_mat) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    23
                    
                    
                      
#'   linear_predictor <- base_matrix[, "trt"] * log(odds_ratio)

                    		
                  

                  

                    24
                    
                    
                      
#'   prob <- 1 / (1 + exp(-linear_predictor))

                    		
                  

                  

                    25
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    26
                    
                    
                      
#'   bin_endpoint <- rbinom(

                    		
                  

                  

                    27
                    
                    
                      
#'     NROW(base_matrix),

                    		
                  

                  

                    28
                    
                    
                      
#'     1,

                    		
                  

                  

                    29
                    
                    
                      
#'     prob

                    		
                  

                  

                    30
                    
                    
                      
#'   )

                    		
                  

                  

                    31
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    32
                    
                    
                      
#'   cbind(base_matrix, matrix(bin_endpoint, ncol = 1, dimnames = list(NULL, "ep")))

                    		
                  

                  

                    33
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    34
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    35
                    
                    
                      
#' data_list <- list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    36
                    
                    
                      
#'   list(add_binary_endpoint(1.5), add_binary_endpoint(1.5)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    37
                    
                    
                      
#'   list(add_binary_endpoint(2.5), add_binary_endpoint(2.5))

                    		
                  

                  

                    38
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    39
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    40
                    
                    
                      
#' guide <- data.frame(

                    		
                  

                  

                    41
                    
                    
                      
#'   trueOR = c(1.5, 2.5),

                    		
                  

                  

                    42
                    
                    
                      
#'   driftOR = c(1.0, 1.0),

                    		
                  

                  

                    43
                    
                    
                      
#'   index = 1:2

                    		
                  

                  

                    44
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    45
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    46
                    
                    
                      
#' sdl <- sim_data_list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    47
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_list = data_list,

                    		
                  

                  

                    48
                    
                    
                      
#'   guide = guide,

                    		
                  

                  

                    49
                    
                    
                      
#'   effect = "trueOR",

                    		
                  

                  

                    50
                    
                    
                      
#'   drift = "driftOR",

                    		
                  

                  

                    51
                    
                    
                      
#'   index = "index"

                    		
                  

                  

                    52
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    53
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    54
                    
                    
                      
#' x <- create_simulation_obj(

                    		
                  

                  

                    55
                    
                    
                      
#'   data_matrix_list = sdl,

                    		
                  

                  

                    56
                    
                    
                      
#'   outcome = logistic_bin_outcome("ep", normal_prior(0, 1000)),

                    		
                  

                  

                    57
                    
                    
                      
#'   borrowing = sim_borrowing_list(list(

                    		
                  

                  

                    58
                    
                    
                      
#'     full_borrowing = borrowing_details("Full borrowing", "ext"),

                    		
                  

                  

                    59
                    
                    
                      
#'     bdb = borrowing_details("BDB", "ext", exponential_prior(0.0001))

                    		
                  

                  

                    60
                    
                    
                      
#'   )),

                    		
                  

                  

                    61
                    
                    
                      
#'   treatment = treatment_details("trt", normal_prior(0, 1000))

                    		
                  

                  

                    62
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    63
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    64
                    
                    
                      
#' \dontrun{

                    		
                  

                  

                    65
                    
                    
                      
#' i <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    66
                    
                    
                      
#' j <- 1

                    		
                  

                  

                    67
                    
                    
                      
#' anls_obj <- x@analysis_obj_list[[i]][[j]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    68
                    
                    
                      
#' res <- mcmc_sample(anls_obj, iter_sampling = 500)

                    		
                  

                  

                    69
                    
                    
                      
#' draws <- res$draws()

                    		
                  

                  

                    70
                    
                    
                      
#'

                    		
                  

                  

                    71
                    
                    
                      
#' psborrow2:::sim_is_null_effect_covered(

                    		
                  

                  

                    72
                    
                    
                      
#'   draws,

                    		
                  

                  

                    73
                    
                    
                      
#'   c(0.025, 0.975)

                    		
                  

                  

                    74
                    
                    
                      
#' )

                    		
                  

                  

                    75
                    
                    
                      
#' }

                    		
                  

                  

                    76
                    
                    
                      
sim_is_null_effect_covered <- function(draws,

                    		
                  

                  

                    77
                    
                    
                      
                                       posterior_quantiles) {

                    		
                  

                  

                    78
                    !
                    
                      
  summ_draws <- posterior::summarise_draws(draws, ~ quantile(.x, probs = posterior_quantiles))

                    		
                  

                  

                    79
                    !
                    
                      
  effect_range <- c(

                    		
                  

                  

                    80
                    !
                    
                      
    summ_draws[summ_draws$variable %in% c("HR_trt", "OR_trt"), 2][[1]],

                    		
                  

                  

                    81
                    !
                    
                      
    summ_draws[summ_draws$variable %in% c("HR_trt", "OR_trt"), 3][[1]]

                    		
                  

                  

                    82
                    
                    
                      
  )

                    		
                  

                  

                    83
                    !
                    
                      
  return(as.integer(1.00 >= effect_range[1] & 1.00 <= effect_range[2]))

                    		
                  

                  

                    84
                    
                    
                      
}
